SA20srabhusu:187_14: tatra śikṣitukāmo bhavati / yathābhūtasyāsya yajjāgarikāyogamārabhya buddhānujñātaṃ jāgarikānuyogaṃ sampādayiṣyāmīti yaśchando,

SA20srabhusu:193_13: bhūtaṃ bhūtato jānāti / yadutānityato vā, [duḥkhato] vā, śūnyato vā, [anātmato vā], anityeṣu, duḥkheṣu, śūnyeṣu, anātmasu dharmeṣu sa evaṃ yoniśo manasi kurvan,
SA20srabhusu:193_15: nirvicikitsaḥ / dharme, saṃghe, duḥkhe, samudaye, nirodhe, mārge, hetau, hetusamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu niṣkāṅkṣo bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:195_1: _104] tasya ca prahāṇāya dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /

SA20srabhusu:196_1: tadāhārakebhyaśca dharmebhya āvaraṇīyebhyastenāha caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /

SA20srabhusu:198_0: ātmādhipateyā katamā / yathāpi tadutpanne anyatamānyatamasminnivaraṇe ātmata eva pratirūpatāmviditvā,
SA20srabhusu:198_2: prajahāti, vinodayati, vyantīkaroti / tena nivaraṇenātmānaṃ na jñāyamānaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:198_3: cetasa upakleśakareṇa, prajñādaurbalyakareṇa, vighātapakṣyeṇaivamasāvātmānamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_0: kathaṃ lokamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_4: śāstā me apavaded, devatā api, vijñā api, sabrahmacāriṇo [a]dharmatayā vigarhayeyuriti /
SA20srabhusu:199_5: sa lokamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_6: ihāsya nivaraṇe samutpanne, utpattikāle vā pratyupasthite,
SA20srabhusu:199_8: śāstā me apavaded, devatā api / vijñā api, sabrahmacāriṇo [a]dharmatayā vigarhayeyuriti /
SA20srabhusu:199_9: sa lokamevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā, anutpannaṃ ca nivaraṇaṃ notpādayati,
SA20srabhusu:199_10: utpannaṃ ca prajahāti / evaṃ lokamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_11: śayanāsanapratiguptyarthaṃ punarlokācārañcānuvṛtto bhaviṣyatīti yāvadrātryāḥ prathame yāme caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_12: āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālayati /
SA20srabhusu:199_13: prakṣālya, vihāraṃ praviśya, śayyāṃ kalpayati / yāvadeva svasyo (yau)pacayikānāmmahābhūtānāṃ upacayāya [/]
SA20srabhusu:200_2: kiṃ punaratra sādharmyaṃ [/] siṃhaḥ prāṇaṃ (prāṇī) sarveṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ prāṇināṃ vikrānta,
SA20srabhusu:200_3: utsāhī, dṛḍhaparākramaḥ / bhikṣurapi jāgarikānuyukta ārabdhavīryo viharati /
SA20srabhusu:200_4: vikrānta, utsāhī, dṛḍhaparākramaḥ / atastasya siṃhopamaiva śayyā pratirūpā bhavadi(ti),
SA20srabhusu:200_5: no tu pretaśayyā, devaśayyā, na kā[ma]bhogaśayyā / tathā hi te sarva eva kusīdā,
SA20srabhusu:200_6: hīnavīryā, ca(ma)ndabalaparākramāḥ / api tu dharmataiṣā yaddakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhopamāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayato na tathā gātrāṇāṃ vikṣepo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:200_8: na ca gāḍhaṃ svapiti / pāpakāṃśca svapnāṃ (pnān) na paśyati /
SA20srabhusu:200_9: anyathā tu śayyāṃ kalpayato viparyayeṇa sarve doṣā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:201_1: sumanasikṛtaṃ / sujuṣṭaṃ, supratividdhaṃ / yadeva manasi kurvan sa prabhā sahagatena cittena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:201_2: suptasyāpi cāsya yena na bhavati cetasaḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:202_2: cintitā, bhāvitā vā, [Śbh_Sh:_107] kuśalā arthopasaṃhitāstadanvayā [a]sya smṛtiryāvatsvapanakālānuvarttinī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:202_3: yathāsya suptasyāpi ta eva dharmā jāgrato vā abhilapanti,
SA20srabhusu:202_7: avyākṛtacitto vā [/] evaṃ smṛtaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:203_1: suptasyāsya tathā smṛtasya yasminsamaye [a]nyatamānyatamenopakleśena cetasaḥ saṃkleśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:203_2: sa utpadyamānameva taṃ saṃkleśaṃ samyageva prajānāti,
SA20srabhusu:203_3: nādhivāsayati, prajahāti, pratividhyati / pratyudāvarttayati mānasaṃ / tenocyate saṃprajānaṃ(nan) śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:204_1: sa vīryasaṃpragṛhītaṃ cittaṃ kṛtvā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:204_3: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ viddhamavakramaṇanimnaṃ cittaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:204_4: tatpravaṇaṃ / na tatprābho (bhā)ramapi (/) cāsyaivaṃ bhavati / aho batāhaṃ buddhānujñātāṃ jāgaritāṃ (kāṃ)sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sampādayeyamiti /
SA20srabhusu:204_7: api cāsyaivaṃ bhavati / yathāhamadya [Śbh_Sh:_108] jāgarikārthamārabdhavīryo vyahārṣaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:204_9: dakṣo [a]nalasa, utthānasampannaḥ, śvaḥ prabhāte, nirgatāyāṃ ca rajanyāṃ, bhūyasyā mātrayā ārabdhavīryo vihariṣyāmi utthānasampanna iti /
SA20srabhusu:204_11: yenāhaṃ (yaṃ) śaknoti laghu laghveva utthānakāle utthātuṃ,
SA20srabhusu:204_15: sati smṛtisaṃpramoṣe, satyuttaratrottaratra samādānāya prayukto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:205_0: sa rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghveva prativibudhyāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayatīti /
SA20srabhusu:205_2: sa cāyamālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ / saṃprajāna[n], utthānasaṃjñāmeva manasi kurvan,
SA20srabhusu:205_9: mandāyitatve, ālasyakausīdye, laghu laghvevotthānaṃ bhavatyābhogamātrādeva no saṃgrāmaṃ vā kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaḥ pariśuddhiḥ pūrvavadvedi tavyāḥ (vyā) /
SA20srabhusu:206_0: samāsārthāḥ punaḥ katame / iha jāgarikāyogamanuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:206_1: katamāni catvāri / yāvajjāgrati (gati) tāvatkuśalapakṣaṃ na riṃcati /
SA20srabhusu:206_5: notthānakālamativartate / itīmāni catvāri samyakkaraṇīyānyāramya bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ jāgarikānuyogo deśitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:207_0: kathaṃ ca punardeśitaḥ / yattāvadāha [/] divā caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāmāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:207_1: evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamayāmami (i)tyanena tāvat prathamaṃ samyakkaraṇīyamākhyātaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:207_5: vihāraṃ praviśya, dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:207_8: nākālena / yatpunarāha / ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ / saṃprajāna[n], utthānasaṃjñāmeva manasi kurvan,
SA20srabhusu:207_11: na saṃkliṣṭacitta iti / yat punarāha rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghveva prativibudhya āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhayatītyanena caturthaṃ samyakkaraṇīyamākhyātaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:207_16: yaduta smṛtyā, saṃprajanyena, dvābhyāṃ punaḥ kāraṇābhyāṃ kālena prativibudhyate /
SA20srabhusu:207_17: no tu kālamativartate / yadutālokasaṃjñayā, utthānasaṃjñayā ca / kathaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā kuśalamālambanaṃ parigṛhya svapiti /
SA20srabhusu:207_18: saṃprajanyena, tasmāt, kuśalādālambanāccyavamānaṃ, [Śbh_Sh:_111] saṃkliśyamānaṃ cittaṃ laghu laghveva samyakprajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:207_20: tatrālokasaṃjñayā, utthānasaṃjñayā ca / na gāḍhaṃ svapiti / nāsya dūrānugataṃ tanmiddhaparyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:208_0: saṃprajānadvihāritā katamā / yathāpīhaikatyaḥ abhikramapratikrame saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:208_2: saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇe / aśite, pīte, khādite, svādite, niṣaṇṇe, śayite, jāgṛte, pra[la]pite, tūṣṇīṃbhāve, nidrāklamavinodane saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:209_1: tatra katamo [a]bhikramaḥ / pratikramaḥ katamaḥ / abhikramapratikrame samprajānadvihāritā [katamā] /
SA20srabhusu:212_2: atra mayā abhikramitavyaṃ / atra mayā punarnābhikramitavyamiti /
SA20srabhusu:212_3: samyageva prajānati / ayamvā me abhisaṃkramaṇakālaḥ ayaṃ nābhisaṃkramaṇakāla iti /

SA20srabhusu:248_1: smartumicchati / tadyathā sūtraṃ, geyaṃ, vyākaraṇamiti vistareṇa pūrvavanna smarati /
SA20srabhusu:249_2: tamenaṃ smārayati / punarapi pratinavīkaroti / uttānī karoti / deśayati, saṃprakāśayati / yaccāpi kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:250_0: kathamavavādako bhavati / prāvivekye pratisaṃlayane, yoge, manasikāra(re), śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ kālena kālamānulomikaṃ avavādaṃ pravarttayati /

SA20srabhusu:250_3_1: nirodhakathāṃ, apacayakathāṃ, asaṃsargakathāṃ, idaṃpratyaya[tā [Śbh_Sh:_133] pra]tītyasamutpādānulomān (māṃ) kathāṃ karoti /

SA20srabhusu:251_3: praṇāmayati cainaṃ / punarapi ca dharmeṇa samayepratisaṃstarasāmīcīsaṃjñaptiṃ pratigṛhaṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:251_4: saṃrohakaśca bhavati / karaṇīye cākaraṇīye bhāvyācārānadhyācārān adhyācīrṇe (carite) anadhyācīrṇe (carite) ca śāstyanuśāstyevamanuśāsako bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:252_2: tadyathā dānakathāṃ, śīlakathāṃ, svargakathāṃ, kāmeṣvādīnava niḥsaraṇaṃ, vyavadānapakṣāndharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
SA20srabhusu:252_4: duḥkhaṃ vā ārabhya, samudayamvā, nirodhamvā, phalamvā, saparipākāya (sattvasaṃkleśāya?) vā,

SA20srabhusu:252_10: sahitāṃ, avyavakīrṇāṃ, yathādhārmikīṃ, yathāparṣanmaitracitto, hitacittaḥ, anukampācittaḥ / aniśrito lābhasatkāraślokena cātmānamutkarṣayati /

SA20srabhusu:256_1: tatra sūtraṃ katamat / yattatra tatra bhagavatā tāṃstān (tāni tāni) vineyācaritāni cārabhya skandhapratisaṃyuktā vā kathā kṛtā,
SA20srabhusu:256_3: dhātusaṃgaṇasaṃyuktā vā, āyatanapratisaṃyuktā vā / pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktā vā,

SA20srabhusu:259_0: gāthā katamā / yā na gadyena bhāṣitā / apitu pādopanibandhena dvipadā vā,
SA20srabhusu:259_1: tripadā vā, catuṣpadā vā, paṃcapadā vā, ṣaṭpadā vā iyamucyate gāthā /

SA20srabhusu:262_0: avadānaṃ katamat / yatsadṛṣṭāntakamudāhataṃ / yena dṛṣṭāntena yasya prakṛtasyārthasya vyavadānaṃ bhavatīdamucyate /
SA20srabhusu:264_0: jātakaṃ katamat / yadatītamadhvānamupādāya tatra tatra bhagavataḥ cyutyupapādeṣu bodhisattvacaryā duṣkaracaryā /

SA20srabhusu:266_1_1: sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāśca tadanyaprativiśiṣṭāścāścaryādbhutasammatā guṇaviśeṣā ākhyātā ime ucyante adbhutā dharmāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:268_1: astyabhidharmaḥ / tatra yattāvadāha / sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānavṛttakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmā iti /

SA20srabhusu:280_3: [Śbh_Sh:_145] kudeśe vā vasati / yatrāsya vāsa(saṃ)kalpayato divā vāgraviloko (vogro raverāloko) bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:280_4: prabhūtaḥ, rātrau vā [/] uccaśabdo, mahāśabdomahājanakāyasya nirghoṣaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:282_0: tatra prayogāntarāyo yenāntarāyeṇa samava[hitena] saṃmukhībhūtenāśakto bhavatyapratibalaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayoge [/]
SA20srabhusu:282_1: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / yadābādhako bhavati, bāḍhaglānaḥ, abhīkṣṇamasya vāto vā kupyate,

SA20srabhusu:283_0: prāvivekyāntarāyaḥ katamaḥ [/] yadbhojanaguruko bhavati, bahvartho, bahukṛtyo, bahukaraṇīyaḥ, karmārāmaratiṃ [Śbh_Sh:_146] rato bhavati / teṣu teṣvitikaraṇīyeṣu prasṛtamānasaḥ /

SA20srabhusu:283_3: rājakathāmvā karoti / corakathāṃ vā, annakathāṃ vā, pānakathāṃ vā, vastukathāṃ vā, veśyākathāṃ vā, vīthīkathāmvā janapadamahāmātrākhyānakathāmvā,
SA20srabhusu:283_4: samudrākhyānakathāmvā [/] ityevaṃ bhāgīyayā anarthopasaṃhitayā kathayā kālamatināmayati /

SA20srabhusu:283_10: idamevaṃbhāgīyo (ima evaṃ bhāgīyā) dharmāḥ pravivekāntarāyo veditavyaḥ /

SA20srabhusu:283_19: yadrūpeṇa cādeśavāsena / manuṣyakṛto vā parataḥ saṃghaṭṭo bhavati /

SA20srabhusu:688_1: tatra kṛtapuṇyatā / yayā abhirūpo bhavati / darśanīyaḥ / prāsādiko dīrghāyurbhavatyādeyavākyo,
SA20srabhusu:689_0: tatra guṇānvita iti / guṇā alpecchatādayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:689_1: yathoktaṃ śramaṇālaṃkāre tairayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:689_2: itīmānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni mandarajaskasya pudgalasya liṃgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:691_0: tatra catvāraḥ śramaṇāḥ / mārgajinaḥ / mārgadeśikaḥ / mārgajīvī / mārgadūṣī ca /
SA20srabhusu:692_2: tatra yaḥ pratipannaḥ / sa mārgajīvī / yo mithyāpratipannaḥ sa mārgadūṣī /
SA20srabhusu:694_1: darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ vijayāttatra tathāgato bodhisattvaścāyatyāṃ bodhāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:694_2: śrāvakāśca sūtradharā, vinayadharā, mātṛkādharāśca / ye sāṃketikaṃ dharmavinayaṃ dhārayanti /
SA20srabhusu:694_4: ima ucyante mārgadeśikāḥ / tatra ye pṛthagjanakalyāṇakā ātmahitāya pratipannā śajjinaḥ (mārgadeśikāḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:694_5: kaukṛtikāḥ śikṣākāmāḥ / aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya āsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai prayuktā,
SA20srabhusu:694_7: ima ucyante mārga jīvinaḥ / apyeṣāmūṣmā yene[ya]masya āryasya prajñendriyasyotpattaye,
SA20srabhusu:694_8: na mṛtā jīvantītyucyate / tenocyante mārgajīvina iti / tatra yoyaṃ pudgalo duḥśīlaḥ pāpadharmā yāvadabrahamacārī [brahmacārī] (ri) pratijñaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:694_9: ayamucyate mārgadūṣī dūṣitonena mārgo bhavati mūlata āditaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:695_1: iha katamaḥ śramaṇaḥ / iha yāvaccaturthaḥ / śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ / śramaṇaibrahmiṇaiśca / yatrāryāṣṭāṃgo mārgaḥ prajñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:696_0: tatra (ya) trayo brāhmaṇāḥ / tadyathā jātibrāhmaṇaḥ / saṃjñābrāhmaṇaḥ / pratipattibrāhmaṇaśca / tatra jātibrāhmaṇaḥ / yoyaṃ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ kulajāto,
SA20srabhusu:696_1: yonijo, mātṛsambhūtaḥ / utpanno mātṛtaḥ, pitṛtaḥ / tatra saṃjñābrāhmaṇa iti loke nāma bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:696_2: saṃjñā, samājñā, prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ / pratipattibrāhmaṇaḥ / yotyantani(ntaṃ) bhavati kṛtārthaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:697_0: tatra trayo brahmacāriṇaḥ / tadyathā viratisamādāyī / tadantaraprahāyī, tadatyantaprahāyī ca / tatra viratisamādāyī / yo brahmacaryā[t]punardharmātprativirato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:697_1: samādattaśikṣaḥ / tatra tadantaraprahāyī yo laukikena mārgeṇa kāmavītarāgaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:698_0: tatra pañca bhikṣavaḥ / bhikṣatīti bhikṣuḥ / pratijñābhikṣuḥ / saṃjñābhikṣuḥ / bhinnakleśatvādbhikṣuḥ / jñapticaturthena karmaṇopasampādito bhikṣuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:699_0: tatra trayo yatayaḥ / dauḥśīlyasaṃyamād yatiḥ / yokuśalād vākkāyakarmaṇaḥ prativirataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:699_1_0: viṣayasaṃyamādyatiḥ / ya indriye guptadvāraḥ / ārakṣitasmṛtiḥ / nipakasmṛti[ḥ /] vistareṇa pūrvavat / kleśasaṃyamādyatiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:699_4: prajahāti / viśodhayati / vyantīkaroti / so 'yaṃ dvividhaḥ kleśasaṃyamo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:700_0: tatra dvau pravrajitau / svāravyātadharmavinayo, durākhyātadharmavinayaśca / tatra svākhyātadharmavinayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:700_1: bhikṣurbhikṣuṇī, śikṣamāṇā, śrāmaṇera[ḥ], śrāmaṇerī / api ca pravrājayatyātmanaḥ pāpakānakuśalān dharmān sa pravrajita ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:700_3_0: tadyathā tīrthika[ḥ], parivrājo (vrāḍ), nirgrantho vā, parivrājakopāṇḍuroga iti / yo vā punarapyevaṃbhāgīyaḥ / tenāhaṃ (ha)
SA20srabhusu:700_3_1: śramaṇo, brāhmaṇo, brahmacārī, bhikṣuryatiḥ, pravra [........................................] ra-ca / kālaprabhedaḥ dīrghakālabhāvitamārgo,
SA20srabhusu:700_6: yadvā saṃpra [.........................................] jña upāyajña[ḥ] kuśala ityarthaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:700_8: dīrghakālabhāvitabhāvita [...........................................] trayeṇa bhedena / yogaprayogakālabhedenāptānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ yastāvadpudgalaḥ aparipakvendriyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:700_9: sa tāvadupāyajñopi sātatikopi kṛtaparicayopi nārādhako bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:700_11: tatra paripakvendriyaśca [...............................] jño bhavati / paripakvendriyo bhavati / upāyajño na kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:700_12: tatra paripakvendriyo, bhavatyupāyajño, na sātatiko, na kṛtaparicayaḥ / na tāvatkṛtasvārtho bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:700_14: sātatikaḥ, kṛtaparicayaśca bhavatyevaṃ sa ārādhako bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:701_3: tatra catvāro mārāḥ / tadyathā- skandhamāraḥ, kleśamāraḥ, maraṇamāraḥ / devaputramāraśca / paṃcopādānaskandhāḥ skandhamāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:701_4: traidhātukāvacarāḥ kleśāḥ / teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ / tasmāttasmātsattvanikāyāḥ ya(yādya)nmaraṇaṃ kālakriyā [Śbh_Sh_345] maraṇamāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:701_7: vyākṣepakaraṇe / ayamucyate devaputramāraḥ / tatra yatra ca mriyate / yaścāsau mṛtyuryena ca mṛtyuṃ namayati,
SA20srabhusu:702_5: yena naiva vā śaknoti maraṇadharmatāṃ samatikramitum /
SA20srabhusu:703_0: tatra yo vītarāgaḥ (/) eva hastagato yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:704_0: tatra mārakarmāṇi / yasya kasyacitkarmaṇo dharmacchandaḥ samutpanno naiṣkramyopasaṃhitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:704_4: yasya raṃjanīyeṣu rūpeṣu sahagatvarasampraṣṭavyadharmeṣu nimittagrāhitāyāmanuvyaṃjanagrāhitāyāṃ cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:704_6: evaṃ bhojaneṣu mātrajñasya viharataḥ praṇīteṣu raseṣu chandarāgamanunayena cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:704_7: bhaktavaiṣamye evaṃ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyo gamananuyuktasya viharataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:704_11: abhikramapratikramādiṣu śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā ayoniśo nimittagrāheṇa cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:704_13: bahvarthatāṃ(tāyāṃ), bahukṛtyatāyāṃ, cittaṃ praskandati / tadyathā gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ saṃsargārāmatāyāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:704_17: / tathā buddhe, dharme, saṃghe, duḥkhe, samudaye, nirodhe, mārge / ihaloke, paraloke kāṃkṣā vimataya utpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:704_19: araṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, śūnyāgāragato vā, mahāntambhayabhairavaṃ paśyatyu[t]trāsakaraṃ romaharṣaṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:704_20: brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa, vā manuṣyaveṣeṇa vā, amanuṣyaveṣeṇa vā, kaścidupasaṃkramyāyoniśaḥ (/) [Śbh_Sh_347] śuklapakṣādvicchindayati /
SA20srabhusu:704_23: mātsarye mahecchatāyāṃ / asantuṣṭau, krodhopanāha (/) kuhanālapanādiṣu / śramaṇālaṃkāravipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:704_25: itīmānyevaṃbhāgīyāni mārakarmāṇi veditavyāni tāni caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ yathāyogaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:705_2: anulomāvavādena / samādhidurbbalatayā ca / indriyāṇi cenna samudāgatāni /
SA20srabhusu:705_3: ānulomikaścāvavādo bhavati / samādhiśca kevalavān / evamasyārambho viphalo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:705_6: samādhiśca balavān bhavati / evamārambho viphalaḥ / indriyāṇi cetsamudāgatāni / sa avavādaścānulomiko bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:705_9: ānulomikaścāvavādo bhavati / samādhiśca durbbalo bhavatyeva[mā]rambho viphalaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:705_11: ānulomikaścāvavādaḥ / samādhiśca balavānevama [Śbh_Sh_348]syārambhaḥ saphalo bhavatyebhistribhiḥ kāraṇairviphalo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:709_0: evaṃ kṛte pudgalavyavasthāne, ālambanavyavasthāne, yāvadbhāvanāphalavyavasthāne ātmakāmena pudgalena svārthamanuprāptukāmena ādikarmikena (ṇa) /
SA20srabhusu:709_2: ācāryo vā, upādhyāyo vā, puruṣo, gurusthānīyo vā, caturṣu sthāneṣu smṛtimupasthāpya upasaṃkramitavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:709_3: abhijñābhiprāyeṇa, nopālambhacittatayā, sagauraveṇa, na samānastambhatayā / kiṃkuśalagaveṣiṇā / nātmodbhāvanārthaṃ / ātmānaṃ parāṃśca kuśalamūlena yojayiṣyāmīti /
SA20srabhusu:709_4: na lābhasatkārārthamevaṃ ca punarupasaṃkramya kālenāvakāśaṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhusu:709_5: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā, dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya,
SA20srabhusu:710_0: ityevañca punarāyācitena yoginā yogajñena sa ādikarmikaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:710_18: anirākṛtadhyāyī, vipaśyanayā samanvāgataḥ / bṛṃhayitā śūnyāgārāṇāṃ svakāyayogamanuyuktaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:710_20: parahitāya, bahujanahitāya, lokānukampāyai, [Śbh_Sh_353] arthāya, hitāya, sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāmityevaṃbhāgīyaiḥ ślakṣṇairvacanapathaiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:710_24: dharmaṃ, saṃghaṃ, no cetobahirdhānyaṃ śāstāraṃ vā,
SA20srabhusu:710_25: dakṣiṇīyamvā saṃjānāti, kaccitte ādipariśodhitādbrahmacaryasya bhāvanāyai śīlaṃ ca te saviśuddhaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:710_26: dṛṣṭiśca ṛjvī kaccitte āryasatyānāmuddeśavibhaṃgamāramya dharmaḥ śrutaścodgṛhītaśca /
SA20srabhusu:710_27: alpo vā, prabhūto vā, kaccitte nirvāṇā dhimuktaṃ cittaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:711_0: sacetpṛṣṭa omiti prajānāti / tata uttari caturṣu sthāneṣu caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanveṣitavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:713_1: samanveṣitavyaṃ / sa evaṃ paripraṣṭavyaḥ / āyuṣmānātmano gotramvā, indriyamvā, caritaṃ vā [/] kiṃ gotrohaṃ / kīdṛśāni me indriyāṇi mṛdūni,
SA20srabhusu:713_2: madhyāni, tīkṣṇāni, kiṃ rāgacaritaḥ / atha dveṣacaritaḥ / evaṃ tāvad vitarkavicārita (vicāracarita) iti /
SA20srabhusu:713_3: sa cetsa prājño bhavati / pū(pau)rvāparyeṇa cāmuno gotramindriyaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:713_6: sa cetpunaryukto bhavati / na cānena paurvāparyeṇa yāvannimittīkṛtaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:713_8: sa pṛṣṭo na vyākaroti / tasya tata uttarakālaṃ kathayā tāvattrīṇi samanveṣitavyāni /
SA20srabhusu:713_10: citrairgamakaidhurairvacanapathaiḥsa tasyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ sa cecchrāvakagotro bhavatyatyarthaṃ tayā kathayā prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:713_11: hṛṣyate, ānandījātaḥ, saumanasyajāto bhavati / (na) prasīdati nādhi (adhi)mucyate /
SA20srabhusu:713_12: mahāyānapratisaṃyuktāyāmvā punaḥ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ yo mahāyānagotraḥ so 'tyarthaṃ prīyate /
SA20srabhusu:713_16: udgrahṇāya, prativedhāya ca / madhyendriyo na, tīkṣṇendriyastu / āśu dharma copalakṣayatyudgṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:713_19: sa prasadanīyāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyā matyarthaṃ prasīdati ramate /
SA20srabhusu:713_21: cāptā ca magru (aśru?) prapātaṃ ca snigdhasantānatāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:713_23: saced dveṣacarito bhavati / nirvedhikāyāṃ kathāyāṃ kathyamānāyāṃ nirvāṇapratisaṃyuktāyāṃ nirāmiṣamu[t]trasya saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:713_26: jānātyarthaṃ śuśrūṣate / na śrotramavadadhāti / na tathā prajñācittamupasthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:713_30: durgṛhītagrāhī bhavati / na dṛḍhaṃ gṛhṇāti / na sthiraṃ, udgṛhītañca nāśayati / na puna[ḥ] kaya(tha)yā paripṛcchana kaśca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:713_31: evaṃ kathayā / gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca samanveṣitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:713_32: kathaṃ ceṣṭayā [/] yāni pūrvoktāni liṃgāni / śrāvakagotrasya, rāgacaritānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ tāni ceṣṭetyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:713_33: tayā ca ceṣṭayā yathāyogaṃ gotramindriyaṃ caritaṃ ca samanveṣitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:714_1: yathāpi sa yogī yogajño lābhī bhavati cetaḥ paryāyajñānasya [/]
SA20srabhusu:714_4: [Śbh_Sh_358] etāni catvāri sthānānyebhiścaturbhiḥ kāraṇaissamanveṣya pañcasu sthāneṣu vinayate /
SA20srabhusu:714_6: prāvivekye, cittaikāgratāyāḥ(yāṃ), āvaraṇaviśuddhau, manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ ca / tatra samādhisaṃbhārarakṣopacayaḥ yāvatā śīlasamvareṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:714_7: cāpramādavihārī bhavatyapapariṇāya buddhānuśiṣṭasya ca buddhānujñātasya pudgalasya,
SA20srabhusu:714_14: yasya yasya saṃbhāraparigṛhītasya dharmapravibhāgasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:714_15: sa taṃ vā rakṣatyuttari (raṃ) ca pravibhāgasya pāripūraye /
SA20srabhusu:715_2: tatra sthānasampattadyathā / araṇyamvā, vṛkṣamūlamvā, śūnyāgāramvā-tatra parvatakandaraṃ vā,
SA20srabhusu:715_11: vanasampannaṃ, puṣkariṇīsampannaṃ, śubhaṃ, ramaṇīyaṃ, notkūlanikūlaṃ, na sthāṇukaṇṭakadhānaṃ / na bahupāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:715_13: vāsāya, prahāṇāya, prayogāya / hṛṣṭacittaḥ / pramuditacittaḥ / prahāṇaṃ pradadhāti iyaṃ prathamā sthānasampat /
SA20srabhusu:715_18: sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati / itīyaṃ tṛtīyā sthānasampat / [Śbh_Sh_360] punaraparaṃ ye te ānulomikā jīvitapariṣkārāścī varādayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:715_25: gaṃbhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya suṣṭhu ca prakāśayanti /
SA20srabhusu:716_2: niṣadya yāvatā evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamaṃ yāmaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:716_3: madhyame na (ca) yāme dakṣiṇena pārśvena (ṇa) śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhusu:716_8: pīṭhe vā, tṛṇe vā, saṃstaraṇe vā niṣīdati / paryaṅkamābhujya tu / kena kāraṇena pañca kāraṇāni samanupaśyan saṃpiṇḍitena kāyena praśrabdhirutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:716_13: parapravādibhiḥ / tathā pare aneneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthamabhiprasīdanti buddhaiśca buddhaśrāvakaiścāyaṃ īryāpatho niṣevitaścānujñātaśca [/]
SA20srabhusu:716_14: imāni paṃcakāraṇāni / saṃpaśyati niṣīdati / paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya /
SA20srabhusu:717_2: tatra ṛjunā kāyena pragṛhītena styānamiddhaṃ cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:717_3: niṣkuhakena citte bahirdhā vikṣepo na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhusu:718_2: sarvakṛṣṇapakṣapramukhatayā, prativilomatayā / api ca samādhinimittālambanā pratibhālambanā smṛtiḥ pratimukhe (khī) tyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:719_1: vyapakarṣaḥ katamaḥ / āha / dvividhaḥ kāyavyapakarṣaḥ / cittavyapakarṣaśca / tatra kāyavyapakarṣo yo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ sārdhamavihāritā /
SA20srabhusu:719_2: / tatra cittavyapakarṣaḥ yaḥ kliṣṭamavyākṛtaṃ ca manaskāraṃ ca varjayitvā /
SA20srabhusu:719_3: samāhitabhūmikaṃ vā samādhisaṃbhāraprāyogikaṃ vā manaskāraṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:720_0: tatraikāgratā katamā / āha / punaḥ punaḥ smṛtisabhāgālambanā pravāhānavadyaratiyuktā /
SA20srabhusu:720_2: kuśalacittaikāgratāpi [/] kiṃ punaḥ punaranusmarati / āha / ye dharmā udgṛhītā[ḥ] śrutā, yā cāvavādānuśāsanī pratilabdhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:720_3: gurubhyastāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikanimittaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tadālambanāṃ pravāhayuktāṃ smṛtimanuvarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:720_7: sabhāgamālambanaṃ [/] kasyaitat / sabhāgaṃ [/] āha / kṣayasya vastunaḥ pratirūpakametattasmātsabhāgamityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:720_9: tenālambanena satataṃ ca satkṛtya ceyaṃ pravāhayuktatā /
SA20srabhusu:720_13: samādhiriti sā khalveṣā ekāgratā śamathapakṣyā vipaśyanāpakṣyā ca /
SA20srabhusu:720_14: tatra yā navākārāyāṃ cittasaṃtathau (sthitau) vā [sā] śamathapakṣyā,
SA20srabhusu:723_0_0: kathaṃ saṃsthāpayati / tatprathamopanibaddhaṃ yadeva cittaṃ tadba[la]maudārikamasaṃsthitamaparisaṃsthitaṃ tasminnevālambane
SA20srabhusu:723_0_1: pravarddhanayogena prasādayogena sābhinigrahaṃ sūkṣmīkurvan abhisaṃkṣipan saṃsthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:725_3: tāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā teṣu nimitteṣu tasya cittasya prasaraṃ na dadāti /
SA20srabhusu:726_5: teṣu vitarkopakleśeṣu / prasaraṃ na dadātyevaṃ śamayati /
SA20srabhusu:727_1: kathaṃ vyupaśamayati / smṛtisampramoṣāttadubhayasamudācāra [re] satyutpannotpannān vitarkopakleśān nādhivāsayati /
SA20srabhusu:728_0: kathamekotīkaroti / sābhisaṃskāraṃ nicchi(śchi)draṃ nirantaraṃ samādhipravāhamā (ma)vasthāpayatyeva mekotīkaroti /
SA20srabhusu:729_1: svarasavāhanaṃ / mārgaṃ labhate / yenānabhisaṃskāra (re)vā (ṇā) nābhogenāsya cittasamādhipravāhaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:730_1: tadyathā śrutacintābalena / smṛtibalena / vīryabalena / [Śbh_Sh_366] paricayabalena ca /
SA20srabhusu:731_1: yacchrutaṃ, yā cintā [tā]madhipatiṃ kṛtvā cittamādita ālambane sthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:731_4: upasthāpayati / tataḥ saṃprajanyabalena nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu prasaramananuprayacchan damayati /
SA20srabhusu:732_0: tatra navākārāyāṃ cittasthitau catvāro manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:732_2: anābhogavāhanaśca / tatra sthāpayataḥ, saṃsthāpayato balavāhano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:732_3: avasthāpayata, upasthāpayato, damayataḥ, śamayataḥ, vyupaśamayataḥ, sacchidravāhano manaskāraḥ / ekotīkurvato nichi(śchi)dravāhano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:732_6: yaḥ punarevamadhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathasya lābhī vipaśyanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:732_7: tasyaita eva catvāro manaskārā vipaśyanāpakṣyā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:733_1: caturvidhā vipaśyanā / katamā / bhikṣurdharmān vicinoti / pravicinoti / parivitarkayati / parimīmānsā(māṃsā)māpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:734_0: kathaṃ ca vicinoti / caritaviśodhanaṃ vā ālambanaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:734_1: kauśalyālambanaṃ vā, kleśaviśodhanaṃ vā / yāvadbhāvikatayā vicinoti / yathāvadbhāvikatayā / pravicinoti / savikalpena manaskāreṇa prajñāsahagatena /
SA20srabhusu:735_0: sā khalveṣā vipaśyanā trimukhī ṣaḍvastuprabhedālambanā veditavyā(ḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:736_2: na cintayati / na tulayati / nopaparīkṣate / iyannimittamātrānucaritā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:737_0: yadā punaścintayati / tīrayati tulayatyupaparīkṣate / tadā paryeṣaṇānucaritā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:738_0: yadā punastīrayitvā upaparīkṣya yathā vyavasthāpitameva pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:739_1: sa paryeṣamāṇaḥ / ṣaḍvastūni paryeṣate / arthaṃ, vastu, lakṣaṇaṃ, pakṣaṃ, kālaṃ, yuktiñca paryeṣyannetānyeva (paryeṣamāṇa etānyeva) pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhusu:740_0: kathamarthaṃ paryeṣate / asya bhāṣitasyāyamartho [a]sya bhāṣitasyāyamartha (ta) ityevamarthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:741_0: kathaṃ vastu paryeṣate / dvividhaṃ vastu [/] ādhyātmikaṃ bāhyañca [/] evaṃ vastu paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:742_0: kathaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate / dvividhaṃ / svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca / evaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:743_1: kathaṃ pakṣaṃ paryeṣate / dvividhaḥ pakṣaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣaḥ śuklapakṣaḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:743_2: kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ doṣataḥ / ādīnavataḥ / śuklapakṣaṃ punarguṇato 'nuśaṃsataścaivaṃ [pakṣaṃ] paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:744_0: kathaṃ kālaṃ paryeṣate / trayaḥ kālāḥ [/] atīto 'nāgato vartamānaśca /
SA20srabhusu:745_0: kathaṃ yuktimparyeṣate / catasro yuktayaḥ /[/] apekṣāyuktiḥ, kāryakāraṇayuktiḥ, upapattisādhanayuktirdharmatāyuktiśca /
SA20srabhusu:745_3: nidānaṃ ca nidānataḥ / paryeṣate / kāya (rya) kāraṇayuktyā kāritraṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:745_4: ayandharmaḥ, idaṃ kāritraṃ, ayamidaṃ kāritra iti [/] upapattisādhanayuktyā trīṇi pramāṇāni paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:745_6: kimasti (/) atrātmā, nāstīti kiṃ pratyakṣamupalabhyate na veti,
SA20srabhusu:747_6: etāvacca yoginā jñeyaṃ / yaduta bhāṣitasyārthaḥ, jñeyasya vastunaḥ yāvadbhāvikatā /
SA20srabhusu:747_7: yathāvadbhāvikatā ca / tatrāśubho (bhe) prayukto yogī ṣaḍvastūni paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:747_8: āha [/] aśubhādhipateyaṃ dharmaṃ śrutamudagṛhītamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇaivamarthapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:748_0: kathaṃ vastu paryeṣate [/] sa evamarthapratisaṃvedī tāmaśubhatāṃ dvayorbhāvayorvyavasthāpitāṃ paśyatyadhyātmambahirdhā ca /
SA20srabhusu:749_2: / santyasminkāye keśaromāṇi vistareṇa yāvanmastakaṃ mastakaluṃgaṃ praśrāva (prasrāva) iti /
SA20srabhusu:749_3: tāṃ punaranekavidhāmantaḥ kāyagatāmaśubhatāṃ dvābhyāṃ dhātubhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:749_4: pṛthivīdhātunā, abdhātunā ca [/] tatra keśaromāṇyupādāya / yāvadyakṛtpurīṣā pṛthivīdhāturadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:749_7: tatra vinīlakamadhimucyate / yadanena mṛtakuṇapaṃ svayaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:750_0: tatra nimittamudgṛhya ekāhamṛtaṃ pragaḍitaśoṇitamayaṃ prāptapūyabhāvaṃ vinīlakamityadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:750_3: saptāhamṛtaṃ saṃjātakṛmi ādhmātaṃ ca vimadrāmakaṃ vyādhmātakamityadhimucyate kākaiḥ kuralai(rai)ḥ khādyamānaṃ gṛddhaiḥ śvabhiḥ śrṛgālairvikhādikamityadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:750_5: diśodiśamaṃgapratyaṃgeṣu vikṣipteṣu viśleṣiteṣu samānse(māṃse)ṣu nirmānse (māṃse)ṣu kiṃcicchiṣṭamānse(māṃse)ṣu vikṣiptakamityadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:750_7: bāhvasthīni, prabāhvasthīni / pṛṣṭhā(ṣṭhī) vaṃśaḥ / hanunakraṃ dantamālā madhyataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:750_15: pratyaṃgaśaṃkalikā ca / tatra deha śaṃkalikā śroṇīkaṭāhamupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:750_18: tatra yā dehaśaṃkalikā ca / tatra dehaśaṃkalikā śroṇīkaṭāhamupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:750_21: ūrujaṃghāsthīni ca / tatra yā dehaśaṃkalikā / sā śaṃkalikaivocyate / yā punaḥ pratyaṃgaśaṃkalikā sā asthiśaṃkaliketyucyate /
SA20srabhusu:751_0: api ca dvau śaṃkalikāyānimittagrāhau citrakṛtāyāḥ pāṣāṇa kāṣṭhaśādakṛtāyā vā /
SA20srabhusu:751_1: bhūtaśaṃkalikāyā vā / abhūtaśaṃkalikāyā vā / nimittaṃ manasikaroti / tadāśaṃkalikāmevādhimucyate nāsthiśaṃkalikāṃ /
SA20srabhusu:752_2: tatrāsthikā (vā), śaṃkalikā vā ityayamubhayapakṣyo vipariṇāma iti /
SA20srabhusu:752_4: [Śbh_Sh_374] bahirdhā aśubhatāmākārata evaṃ bahirdhā aśubhatāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:753_0_0: kathamaśubhatāyā[ḥ] ( /) sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate / yathā cādhyātmaṃ bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhāvarṇanibhayā apariṇatā yāvadbahirdhā
SA20srabhusu:753_0_1: bahiḥ kāyasyāśubhā varṇanibhā vipariṇatā adhyātmikayā aśubhayā varṇanibhā samānadharmatāṃ tulyadharmatāmadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:753_1: iyamapi me śubhā varṇanibhā evaṃ dharmiṇīti /
SA20srabhusu:753_2: ye 'pi kecitsattvā anayā śubhayā varṇanibhayā samanvāgatāsteṣāmapi sāśubhāyāṃ evaṃ dharmiṇī tadyatheyambāhyā /
SA20srabhusu:754_0_0: kathaṃ pakṣaṃ paryeṣate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yadāha masyā (anayāśubhayā varṇanibhayā etāmaśubhamatā (tāṃ) yathābhūtamaprajānannadhyātmaṃ
SA20srabhusu:754_0_1: vā bahirdhā vā śubhāyāṃ varṇanibhāyāṃ saṃrāgamutpādayāmi viparyāsa eva kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:754_5: eṣa dharmaḥ aduḥkhaḥ / avighātaḥ / yāvadato nidānā upāyāsā nirudhyante /
SA20srabhusu:755_0_0: kathaṃ kālaṃ paryeṣate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / yeyamadhyātmaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā seyamvarttamānamadhvānamupādāya yā punariyaṃ
SA20srabhusu:755_2: śubhā babhūva / saiṣā tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya śubhā satī tadyathā me etarhi /
SA20srabhusu:755_3: vartamānamadhvānamupādāya / evamānupūrvyā etarhi vartamānamupādāya aśubhā saṃvṛttā,
SA20srabhusu:755_4: sā me iyaṃ [a]śubhā varṇanibhā varttamānamadhvānamupādāyāśubhā satī /
SA20srabhusu:755_6: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / tadyathaiṣā bāhyā eva[ṃ] vartamānamadhvānamupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:755_7: iti hyatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ayamapi me kāya evaṃbhāvī,
SA20srabhusu:755_8: evaṃbhūta, etāṃ ca dharmatāmanatīta ityevaṃ kālaṃ samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:756_0: kathaṃ yuktiṃ samanveṣate / tasyaivaṃ bhavati / nāstīti sa kaścidātmā vā, sattvo vādhyātmaṃ vā, bahirdhāvopalabhya[mānaḥ] yaḥ śubho vā syādaśubho vā [/]
SA20srabhusu:756_1: [Śbh_Sh_376] api ca rūpamātrametatkaṇḍavaramātrametadyatreyaṃ saṃjñā samājñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:758_0: tasyāsya mṛtasya kālagatasyānupūrveṇa vipariṇatā imā avasthāḥ prajñāyante /
SA20srabhusu:758_1: yaduta vinīlakamitivā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāyā vā ayamapi me kāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:758_3: yena hetunā, yena nidānena iyaṃ tāvatkālikī śubhā varṇanibhā /
SA20srabhusu:758_4: prajñāyate / antaḥkāyaḥ punarnityaṃ nityakālamadhyātmaṃ ca bahirdhā cāśubhā evaṃ saṃvṛtiparamārthanidānataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:758_9: aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:758_12: manasi karomi / tathā kāmarāgaparyavasthānaṃ anutpannaṃ ca notpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:758_17: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / prasiddhā dharmatā khalveṣā acintyadharmatā /
SA20srabhusu:758_19: sā ca cintayitavyā / na vikalpayitavyā / adhimoktavyā / evaṃ dharmatāyuktyā aśubhatāmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:759_1: maitryadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā hitasukhādhyāśayagatasya sarveṣu sukhopasaṃhārādhimokṣalakṣaṇā maitrītyetamarthapratisamvedyarthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:759_4: mitrapakṣaṃ vā adhyātmamamitrodāsīnapakṣaṃ bahirdhā evaṃ ca vastuni maitrīṃ samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:760_0: sa punarvicinoti / ya ete trayaḥ pakṣāḥ aduḥkhā sukha(tā)ḥ /
SA20srabhusu:760_3: ye punarete aduḥkhāsukhitāḥ pakṣāḥ sukhakāmāsteṣāṃ [Śbh_Sh_378] trividhā sukhakāmatā prajñāyate /
SA20srabhusu:760_7: evaṃ saprītikena niṣprītikena ca sukhena veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:761_0: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / yaśca mitrapakṣo, yaścāmitrapakṣo, yaścodāsīnapakṣaḥ / tulyacittatā tu mayā karaṇīyeti /
SA20srabhusu:761_1: samacittatā / tatkasya hetoḥ / yastāvanmitra[pakṣa]statra me na duṣkaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:761_3: yastvayamamitrapakṣaḥ / (tatrāyamamitrapakṣaḥ /) tatrātiduṣkaraḥ / tatra tāvanmayā sukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:761_5: tatkasya hetoḥ / nātra kaścidyaḥ ākrośate vā, ākruśyate vā / roṣayati vā, roṣyate vā / bhaṇḍayati vā, bhaṇḍyate vā / tāḍayati vā, tāḍyate vā / anyatrākṣarāṇyetāni ravanti /
SA20srabhusu:761_6: śabdamātra[ṃ] māṣamātrametadapi ca tathā saṃbhūtoyaṃ kāyo rūpī audārikaścāturmahābhūtiko yatra me sthitasyeme evaṃ rūpāḥ sparśāḥ krāmanti /
SA20srabhusu:761_7: yaduta śabdasaṃsparśā vā / [Śbh_Sh_379] pāṇiloṣṭhadaṇḍaśastrasaṃsparśā vā aya[ṃ] me kāyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:761_8: anitya, etepi sparśā ye te apakārakāstepyanityāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:761_9: api ca / sarva eva sattvā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇaste prakṛtyaiva duḥkhitā stan me pratirūpaṃ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:761_10: yadyahaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhiteṣu sattveṣu bhūyo duḥkhopasaṃhārameva kuryāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:761_11: na sukhopasaṃhāraṃ tadamitro (traṃ) mitrasya kuryādyadete sattvā ātmanaivātmanaḥ kurvanti /
SA20srabhusu:762_0: api coktaṃ bhagavatā / nāhaṃ taṃ sulabharūpaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
SA20srabhusu:762_1: yonena dīrghasyādhvanotyayānmātā vā bhū[t] pitā vā,
SA20srabhusu:762_2: bhrātā vā, bhaginī vā, ācāryo vā, upādhyāyo vā, gururvā, gurusthānīyo veti / tadanenāpi paryāyeṇāmitrapakṣa eva[ṃ] me [a]mitrapakṣaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:762_7: samatādṛṣṭiḥ karaṇīyā / tulyaśca hitāśayaḥ, sukhādhyāśayaḥ, sukhopasaṃhāraḥ / sukhopasaṃhārādhimokṣa iti / evaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇena maitrīṃ samanveṣate /
SA20srabhusu:763_0: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / yo me pāpakāriṣu sattveṣu vyāpādaḥ maraṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:763_1: yo vā punarayametarhyavyāpādaḥ a (ma)raṇa eṣa dharma iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhusu:763_2: yo vā punarayametarhyavyāpādaḥ [Śbh_Sh_380] evaṃ maitryā(ḥ) kṛṣṇaśuklaśuklapakṣaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:764_0: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / ye tāvadatītamadhvānamupādāya sukhakāmāḥ sattvāḥ te atītāḥ,
SA20srabhusu:764_3: yāvadanāgatādadhvano nityakālaṃ sukhino bhavanti (ntī) tyevaṃ maitryā(ḥ)kālaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:765_0: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / nāsti kaścidātmā vā, sattvo vā ya eṣa sukhakāmo vā syāt /
SA20srabhusu:765_2: api tu skandhamātrametat saṃskāramātrakametadyatraiṣā saṃjñā saṃjñaptirvyavahāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:765_3: te punaḥ saṃskārāḥ karmakleśahetukā ityevamapekṣāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:765_4: prasiddhadharmatā khalveṣā [a]cintyadharmatā yanmaitrīvyāpādabhāvanā prahāṇāya samvarttata ityevaṃ dharmatāyuktyā maitrīmparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:766_1: tatra kathamidaṃ pratyayatā pratītyasamutpādālambanā vipaśyanāprayuktārthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:766_2: tadadhipateyaṃ dharmamadhimatiṃ kṛtvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmutpādātte te dharmā utpadyante,
SA20srabhusu:766_3: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodhātte te dharmā nirudhyante [/]
SA20srabhusu:766_5: kartā sraṣṭā, nirmātā dharmāṇāṃ, na prakṛtirna puruṣāntaraṃ, pravarttako dharmāṇāmityevamarthapratisaṃvedī arthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:766_8: evaṃ vastu paryeṣate / punaḥ pravicinoti / avidyā yatta(t)pūrvānte ajñānamiti vistareṇa yathā pratītyasamutpādavibhaṃge evaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate [/]
SA20srabhusu:766_9: punaḥ (//) pravicinoti / evaṃ pratītyasamutpannāḥ saṃskārāḥ sarva ete abhūtvā bhāvād,
SA20srabhusu:766_13: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / yo (ya) eṣvanityeṣu duḥkhaśūnyānātmakeṣu saṃskāreṣu yathābhūtaṃ pratisammohaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:767_0: sa punaḥ pravicinoti / asti karmāsti vipākaḥ / kārakastu nopalabhyate / yaḥ karttā vā pratisaṃvedako vā syānnānyatra dharmasaṃketāt /
SA20srabhusu:767_1: teṣvevāvidyāpratyayeṣu [Śbh_Sh_384] saṃskāreṣu yāvajjātipratyaye jarāmaraṇe saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ kārako vedaka ityevaṃ nāmā,
SA20srabhusu:767_2: evaṃ jātya, evaṃ gotra, evamāhāra, evaṃ sukhaduḥkha pratisaṃvedī,
SA20srabhusu:768_0: api ca dvividhametatphalaṃ / dvividho heturātmabhāvaphalaṃ ca,
SA20srabhusu:768_2: tatrātmabhāvaphalaṃ yadetadvipākajaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ viṣayopabhogaphalaṃ yo (yā) iṣṭāniṣṭakarmādhipateyā ṣaṭsparśasaṃbhavā vedanā [/
SA20srabhusu:770_3: parigṛhṇāti / yadbalena yatsāṃmukhyena tatkarma vipākadānadāna samarthaṃ bhavatyayamabhinirvṛttihetuḥ /
SA20srabhusu:770_4: imaṃ ca dvividhaṃ hetumadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ asya trividhaḥ duḥkhatānupakṣasya kevalasyāsya duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavatīti /
SA20srabhusu:771_3: prasiddhadharmatāpyeṣa te (ṣeti) evaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisādhanayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiñca paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:772_1: gotrārtho, dhātvarthaḥ, saṃjñārtho, hetvarthaḥ / prakṛtyartha ityevamarthapratisamvedī arthaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:772_3: kharalakṣaṇā pṛthivī / yāvatsamudīraṇalakṣaṇo vāyuḥ vijānanalakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:772_5: sarva ete dhātavaḥ / anityatayā samasamāḥ / yāvannirātmatayetyevaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:772_6: iti yaḥ piṇḍasaṃjñino dhātunānātvaṃ ajānānasyā[ne]na kāyena nānādhātukena unnatirmanya (nvā) nā maraṇa eṣa dharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ viparyayācchuklapakṣya ityeva[ṃ] pakṣaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:774_0: tadyathā tṛṇaṃ vāpratītya, kāṣṭhamvā cākāśaṃ parivāritamagāro [a]gāra iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyevameva ṣaḍdhātūnupādāya /
SA20srabhusu:774_2: tvaṅmānsa(māṃsa) śoṇitaṃ cākāśe parivārite saṃjñā prajñaptirvyavahāro bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:774_3: kāyaḥ kāya iti / paurāṇāśca karmakleśāḥ svabījaṃ caiṣāṃ nidānamityevamapekṣāyuktimparyeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:774_5: āptāgamopyeṣa pratyātmajñānamanumānikopyeṣa vidhiḥ prasiddhadharmatācintyadharmatetyevaṃ kāryakāraṇayuktimupapattisānayuktiṃ dharmatāyuktiṃ ca paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:775_6: sa ni[ḥ]śvāsaḥ [/] amī dīrghā āśvāsapraśvāsā, amī hrasvā imānsarvakāyena pratisaṃvedayāmi /
SA20srabhusu:775_11: /) jīvitendriyamayaṃ ca kāyaḥ savijñānaka ityanityā āśvāsapraśvāsā mahāśravaṇetyevaṃ (ṇā ityevaṃ) sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:775_12: evamāśvāsapraśvāseṣvanupasthitasmṛteḥ yo vitarkakṛtaḥ saṃkṣobhaścetasaḥ maraṇa(dharma) eṣadharmaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:776_0: atītānāgata pratyutpanneṣvadhvasvā [śvāsapra]śvāsapratibaddhaḥ kāyaḥ kāyacitta (ḥ) pratibaddhāścāśvāsapraśvāsā ityevaṃ kālaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:776_1: nānyatra kaścidya āśvasiti praśvasiti vā asya caite āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:776_2: api tu hetusamutpanneṣu, pratītyasamutpanneṣu saṃskāreṣviyaṃ saṃjñā /
SA20srabhusu:777_3: vipaśyanākāraiḥ paryeṣate /tasya śamathaṃ niśritya vipaśyanā viśudhyate /
SA20srabhusu:777_5: kauśalyālambane ca / kleśāviśodhane ca yā vipaśyanā [/
SA20srabhusu:779_1: ) prayogastadviparyayeṇa [Śbh_Sh_389] ca nava vidhaḥ kṛṣṇapakṣasaṃgṛhīto yoginā veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:779_2_0: tadyathā [a]nurūpaprayogatā, abhyastaprayogatā, aviparītaprayogatā / aśithilaprayogatā / kālaprayogatā / upalakṣaṇaprayogatā /
SA20srabhusu:779_2_1: asaṃtuṣṭaprayogatā / avidhuraprayogatā / samyakprayogatā ca / anayā navavidhayā śuklapakṣasaṃgṛhītayā tvaritatvaritaṃ cittaṃ
SA20srabhusu:779_4: yāvatī cānena bhūmirgantavyā bhavatyanuprāptavyā tāṃ laghu laghvevāgantā bhavatyadhandhāyamānaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:780_2: samabhāgacaritaḥ mandarajaskaḥ punaḥ yatrālambane priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:781_1: abhyāso 'nena kṛto bhavati yo antataḥ parītto 'pi na [Śbh_Sh_390] sarveṇa sarvamādikarmika eva bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:781_2: tathā hyādikarmikasyānurūpe 'pyālambane na prayuktasya nivāraṇāni nābhīkṣṇaṃ samudācarita(ranti) /
SA20srabhusu:781_3: kāyacittadauṣṭhulyaṃ ca / yenāsya tat (ca) cittaṃ samādhīyate /
SA20srabhusu:781_6: glānopasthānārthamvā, sāmīcīkarmaṇo vā anyasyaivaṃbhāgīyasyetikaraṇaṃ yasyārthāya sa tannimnena cetasā tatpravaṇena tatprāstāreṇa (bhāreṇa) ca sarvaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:781_7: laghulaghveva ca kṛtvā, pariprāpya, punareva prayujyate / niyamya pratisaṃlayanāya sa cedbhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsaka kṣatriyabrāhmaṇaparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchati /
SA20srabhusu:781_9: mitaṃ ca saṃlapati / na ca bhāṣyaprabandhamutthāpayati /
SA20srabhusu:781_10: nānyatra vyapakarṣati / evaṃ ca punarārabdhavīryo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:781_12: tatkasya hetoḥ / bahavo me pratyayā maraṇasya- vāto vā me kupyeta,
SA20srabhusu:781_13: pittamvā, śleṣmamvā(śleṣma vā), bhuktaṃ vā viṣamyeta, yena me viṣūcikā kāye santiṣṭheta /
SA20srabhusu:781_14_0: ahirvā me (māṃ) daśeta(t) / vṛściko vā śatapadī vā [ /] manuṣyādapi me bhayamityetāni sthānāni nityakālasya [Śbh_Sh_391]
SA20srabhusu:781_14_1: na- karotyapramattaśca viharatyevaṃ ca punarapramatto vihara[ti /
SA20srabhusu:781_15: ] api bata jīveyaṃ saptāhaṃ ṣaṭ pañcacatustridvire (dvaye)kāhayāmamardhayāmamapi muhūrtamapi ardhamuhūrtamapi [/]
SA20srabhusu:781_18: yāvacca jīveyaṃ tāvadyogamanasikāreṇa śāstuḥ śāsane yogamāpadyeyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:781_19: ya i(di)yatā mayā bahukṛtyaṃ syādyaduta śāstuḥ śāsane itīyamaśithilaprayogatā /
SA20srabhusu:782_0: tatra katamā / aviparītaprayogatā / kālena kālaṃ śamathanimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhusu:782_1: śamathaṃ ca jānāti / śamathanimittaṃ ca / śamathakālañca [/] vipaśyanāṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ vipaśyanākālaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:783_2: nirvikalpaṃ, śānta praśāntaṃ, śamathasthitaṃ, niṣkevalaṃ, tenocyate śamatha iti / tatra śamathanimittaṃ dvividhamālambananimittaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:783_8: śamathakālaḥ katamaḥ / āha / uddhate citte ūrdhvamvābhiśaṃkini śamathasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:783_9: tathā vipaśyanāparibhāvite citte iti karaṇīyavyākṣepopahate śamathakālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:784_1: tatrālambananimittaṃ vipaśyanānimittaṃ [śamatha]pakṣyaṃ jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbamālambananimittaṃ yenālambanena prajñāṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20srabhusu:784_2: tatra nidānanimittaṃ vipaśyanāparibhāvite cetasi uttaratra vipaśyanāpariśuddhaye cetaḥ śamathabimbayogaḥ [/
SA20srabhusu:785_0: tatra vipaśyanākālaḥ śamathaparibhāvite cetasi ādita eva cājñeyavastuyathābhūtāvabodhāya vipaśyanāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:786_0: tatra pragrahaḥ katamaḥ / yānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanenodgṛhītena [Śbh_Sh_393] cittasaṃharṣaṇā saṃdarśanā samādāpanā [/]
SA20srabhusu:786_1: tatra pragrahanimittaṃ yena ca prasadanīyenālambanena nimittena cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:786_2: yasya vīryārambhaḥ tadānulomikastatra pragrahakālaḥ līnaṃ cittaṃ līnatvābhiśaṃkini pragrahasya kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:787_0: tatropekṣākatamā / yā ālambane asaṃkliṣṭacetasaḥ cittasamatā śamathavipaśyanāpakṣe /
SA20srabhusu:787_5: tatropekṣākālaḥ śamathavipaśyanā pakṣālayau (lau)ddhatyavinirmukte cetasi [Śbh_Sh_394] upekṣāyāḥ kālo bhāvanāyai /
SA20srabhusu:789_2: aprativā (bhā)ṇi(ṇī) ca / prahāsairuttaraṃ praṇītataraṃ sthānamabhiprārthayamānorupī bahulaṃ viharatīti /
SA20srabhusu:790_2: na chi(cchi)drīkaroti / na ca śiśumudāravarṇaṃ raṃjanīyaṃ mātṛgrāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nimittagrāhī bhavatyanuvyaṃjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhusu:792_2: tatra navākāracittasthityā vipaśyanā pūrvaṃgamayā adhyātmaṃ cittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:792_9: api ca / vyāpya tadālambanaṃ vibhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpitamasmiṃstvarthe adhyātmaṃ nimittābhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:792_11: [Śbh_Sh_396] tatrādikarmike(ṇa) tatprathamakalpiko (karmikeṇa) ādita eva cittaṃ na kañci(kvaci)dālambane upanibandhitavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:792_12: aśubhāyāmvā, tadasminvā, nānyatra vikṣepāyaiva / kaccinme cittaṃ nirnimittaṃ, nirvikalpaṃ śāntaṃ, praśāntamavicalamavikampyamanutsukaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:792_14: tathā prayukta utpannotpanneṣu sarvabāhyanimitteṣu asmṛtyamanasikāraṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:793_2: kathaṃ ca punaścarati / nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā paryeṣaṇāpratyavekṣaṇānucāriṇyā [/]
SA20srabhusu:793_8: tasmānna muktaḥ / yasmānna nimittīkaroti / na vikalpayati / tasmānnodgṛhītamevamadhyātmamabhisaṃkṣepataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:793_11: na punaḥ punarvibhāvayet / nāsyādhimokṣa uttarottaraḥ / pariśuddhaḥ, paryavadātaḥ / pravartate / yāvaj jñeyavastupratyakṣopagamāya /
SA20srabhusu:793_13: punaḥ punarvibhāvayati / tatosyottarottarodhimokṣaḥ / pariśuddhataraḥ, pariśuddhatamaḥ pravartate / yāvajjñeyavastupratyakṣopagamāya /
SA20srabhusu:793_14: tadyathā citrakaraścitrakarāntevāsī vā tatprathamaścitrakarmaṇi prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:793_15: sa ācāryasyāntikācchikṣāpūrvagamaṃ rūpakamādāya dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭavā pratirūpakaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:793_16: kṛtvā kṛtvā vibhāvayati, vināśayati / punareva ca karoti / ya yathā yathā bhaṅktyā bhaṅktyā karoti /
SA20srabhusu:793_17: tathā tathāsyottaraṃ rūpakaṃ pariśuddhataraṃ paryavadātataraṃ khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:793_19: tatprativiśiṣṭatāmvā [/] sacetpunarabhaṃ(narbhaṃ?) ktyā tadrūpakaṃ tasyaivopariṣṭātpaunaḥpunyena kuryāt /
SA20srabhusu:793_20: na janvandhasya tadrūpakapariśuddhiṃ nigacchedevamihāpi nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:793_23: tāvadadhimucyate / parīttamadhimucyate, parīttameva vibhāvayati / evaṃ yāvanmahadgatapramāṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:793_25: kadācinmahadgatameva / pramāṇamevaṃ mahadgate / pramāṇe veditavyaṃ / tatra rūpiṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yannimittaṃ pratibimbaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:793_26: pratibhāsaṃ(saḥ) tadaudārikaṃ nirmāṇasadṛśamarūpiṇāmvā punardharmāṇāṃ nāmasaṃketapūrvakaṃ yathānubhāvādhipateyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:793_27: pratibhāsamiyamucyate / samyakprayogatā / saiṣā navavidhā śuklapakṣyā śamathavipaśyanānulomā prayogatā veditavyā /
SA20srabhusu:794_0: tatrāvaraṇaviśuddhiḥ katamā / āha / caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ samyakprayukto yogī āvaraṇe svañcittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhusu:795_1: āha / catvāryāvaraṇāni / paritamanā, nivaraṇaṃ, vitarkaḥ / [Śbh_Sh_399] ātmasaṃpragrahaśceti /
SA20srabhusu:795_2: tatra paritamanā yā naiṣkramyaprāvivekyaprayuktasya kliṣṭā utkaṇṭhā,
SA20srabhusu:795_3: aratiḥ / spṛhaṇā, daurmanasyamupāyāsaḥ / tatra nivaraṇaṃ kāmacchandādīni pañcanivaraṇāni /
SA20srabhusu:795_5: kliṣṭā vitarkāḥ / tatrātmasaṃpragraho yadaṇumātrekā (ṇā)varamātrekena (ṇa) jñānadarśanasparśamātrakenā(ṇā)tmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhusu:795_6: ahamasmi lābhī, anye ca na tatheti / pūrvavadvistareṇa veditavyamayamāvaraṇasvabhāvaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:796_2: atiprayogaḥ / ardhaprayogaḥ / ādiprayogaḥ / kleśapracuratā / vivekānabhyāsaśca nivaraṇasya,
SA20srabhusu:796_9: traiyaghvikeṣvahamiti vā, mameti vā, ayogavihitāṃ saṃjñāṃ manasi karotyayamatrāyoniśasta(śaḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:797_0: tatrādīnavaḥ katamaḥ / asminnāvaraṇe sati saṃvidyamāne caturvidhepyanadhigataṃ nādhigatāt parihīyate /
SA20srabhusu:797_1: yogaprayogādbhraśyate / saṃkliṣṭavihārī ca bhavati, duḥkhavihārī ca bhavatyātmā caitamavavadati /
SA20srabhusu:797_2: parataścāvavādaṃlabhate / kāyasya ca bhedāt paraṃ maraṇādapāyeṣūpapadyate /
SA20srabhusu:797_3: tatra pratipakṣaḥ katamaḥ / tatra paritamanā yā samāsato 'nusmṛtayaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:797_4: pratipakṣaḥ anusmṛtimanasikāreṇāyaṃ cittaṃ saṃhaṣayitvā (saṃharṣya) utpannāṃ paritamanāṃ prativinodayatyu(tyanu)tpannāṃ ca notpādayati /
SA20srabhusu:797_5: tatra yacca kāyadaurbalyaṃ, yaścāpratiyogo, yaścādiprayogaḥ / tatra vīryasamatā pratiṣe(ve)dhaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:797_7: tatra śuśrūṣā, paripṛcchā pratipakṣaḥ / yā kleśapracuratā tasyā [Śbh_Sh_401] yathāyogamaśubhādyālambanaprayogaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:797_10: yena me etarhi vivekaprayuktasya paritamanā utpadyate [/]
SA20srabhusu:797_11: sa cedetarhi na kariṣyāmyabhyāsaḥ (saṃ) evamāyati[ḥ] punarbhava evaṃrūpo bhaviṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:798_1: saṃkleśataḥ, tāvacchamathabāhulyaṃ [/] sā khalveṣā vipaśyanā jñeyā [Śbh_Sh_402] kṛṣṇapakṣataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:798_3: nidānaṃ paryeṣate / aparivarjanācca punarasya parivarjanīyasya ko doṣa ityata ādīnavaṃ paryeṣate /
SA20srabhusu:798_4: parivarjitasya cāyatyāṃ kathamanutpādo bhavatītyataḥ pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayatyevamanenāvaraṇebhyaścittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:799_2: yaduta ebhireva tribhirmukhaiḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāmekaikaśyā (syā a)nantākārapraveśanayena,
SA20srabhusu:799_3: yathā ca yathā vipaśyanā samyakprayuktasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāṃ (vipulatāṃ) gacchatyabhyāsapāriśuddhibalamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhusu:799_4: tathā, tathā, śamathapakṣasyāpi kāyacittapraśrabdhijanakasya pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatā (vipulatā) veditavyā /
SA20srabhusu:799_6: cittaṃ ca, tathā tathālambanacittaikāgratāyāśca yadutāśraya[ṃ] vivarddhayate /
SA20srabhusu:799_7: yathā cittaikāgratā vivardhate tathā tathā kāyaḥ praśrabhyate,
SA20srabhusu:799_8: cittaṃ ca, ityetau dvau dharmāvanyonyaṃ nirvṛtāvanyonyaṃ pratibaddhoyaduta cittaikāgratā,
SA20srabhusu:800_2: [Śbh_Sh_403] peyālaṃ ataścāsya yoginaḥ aśubhāprayogasyāsevanānvayāt bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayāccarato vā,
SA20srabhusu:800_3: viharato vā, viṣayasaṃmukhībhāve [a]pi nimittapratyavekṣaṇayāpi prakṛtyaivānabhisaṃskāreṇa bahutarāśubhatāsaṃprakhyānaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:800_4: yathāpi tatsubhāvitatvādaśubhāyāḥ kāmarāgasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ [na] praskandati /
SA20srabhusu:800_5: na prasīdati / nādhimucyate / upekṣā saṃtiṣṭhate / nirvitpratikūlatā veditavyaṃ(yā) /
SA20srabhusu:800_6: yoginānuprāpto (ptaṃ)me, aśubhāprāptaṃ me, bhāvanāphalamiyatā aśubhā pratilabdhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:800_9: dhātuprabhedaḥ / ānāpānasmṛtiśca veditavyā / tatrāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ bahutaraṃ maitracittatā khyāti /
SA20srabhusu:800_10: na pratighanimittaṃ / vyāpādasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:800_11: bahutaramanityatā, duḥkhatā, nairātmyaṃ khyāti, na nityasukhasattvāya dṛṣṭisahagataṃ sammohanimittaṃ mohaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhusu:800_14: na tveva pi (ci)ttasaṃjñā, mānaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:800_16: śamathasaṃjñā / khyāti / na tveva prapañcasaṃjñā vitarkaparyavasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ na praskandatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:801_0: tatra niyatā(taṃ)śamathaśca vipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:801_2: āha / yo lābhī bhavati navākārāyāṃ [Śbh_Sh_405] cittasthitau navamasyākārasya yaduta samāhitatāyāḥ [/]
SA20srabhusu:801_3: sa ca taṃ pariniṣpannaṃ / samādhiṃ niśritya adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:801_8: yathaiva śamathamāsate [te] nocyate śamathaścāsyavipaśyanā cobhe mitrībhūte samayugamvarttete /
SA20srabhusu:802_1: arthatastu lakṣaṇauḥ pacchaiḥ (pakṣaiḥ) kālaiśca saha yuktibhiḥ //
SA20srabhusu:802_5: samyak prayogatā caiva navādhārā dvidhā matā /
SA20srabhusu:803_1: āhādikarmikastatprathamakarmika evaṃ vyāpini lakṣaṇe vyavasthāpite ekāgratāyāmā (ā)varaṇaviśuddheśca mithyāprayogaṃ ca [Śbh_Sh_406] varjayati /
SA20srabhusu:803_2: samyakprayoge ca śikṣate / sa tatprathamata ekāgratāṃ prahāṇābhiratiṃ cādhigamiṣyāmīti caturbhirmanaskāraiḥ prayujyate /
SA20srabhusu:804_1: āha / yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa / saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyayaṃ cittasantāpano manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:806_1_0: āha / yenāyaṃ manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittaṃ samvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu saṃvejayitvā (saṃvejya) kālena kālamabhipramodanīyeṣu
SA20srabhusu:806_2: nirnimittāyāṃ / nirvikalpakatāyāmevaṃ sthāpayatyekāgrāṃ smṛtiṃ pravarttayati yenāsya hetunā,
SA20srabhusu:807_1: yena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ cittena tathādhyātmaṃ saṃśayamiti (saṃśamayati) tena punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ adhiprajñaṃ dharmavipaśyanāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhusu:808_0: katamaḥ kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayatyevamasya taccittaṃ taptaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:808_3: katamāni / āha [/] catvāri / tadyathā ātmavipattiḥ, paravipattiśca, vartamāne samavahite saṃmukhībhūte yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:808_4: tatrātmasampattiḥ / parasampattiśca / abhyatīte kṣaṇe niruddhe vigate vipariṇate yoniśo manasikārānvayātsamvejanīyaṃ [Śbh_Sh_408] sthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:808_6: tasyābhipramodayataḥ / evamasya taccittaṃ snigdhaṃ bhavatyārdraṃ ca,
SA20srabhusu:809_2: ratnāni, śikṣāpadapāriśuddhiḥ / ātmani ca / viśeṣādhigamasaṃbhāvanājātasya cetaso [a]saṃkocaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:809_3: sa evaṃ ratnānyanusaraṃścittamabhipramodayati lābhā me sulabdhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:809_5: lābhā me sulabdhā yo (a)haṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:809_6: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ / yasya me sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śīlavanto guṇavantaḥ peśalāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:810_1: lābhā me sulabdhā[ḥ] so [a]haṃ śāstari tathāgate [a]rhati samyaksaṃbuddhe,
SA20srabhusu:810_5_0: śikṣāsāmānyagato, maitrakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntaḥ, dṛṣṭisāmānyagataḥ / sādhāraṇaparibhogī [ /] evaṃ śikṣāpadapāriśuddhiṃ, [Śbh_Sh_409]
SA20srabhusu:811_4: bhavyo [a]hamasmyevaṃbhūta, evaṃ pratipanno, dṛṣṭa eva dharme aprāptasya prāptaye,
SA20srabhusu:812_0: api ca / yadanena pūrveṇāparamārabdhavīryeṇa viharatā viśeṣādhigamaḥ kṛto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:812_4: ramayati / saṃyojayatyevamasya taccitte(ttaṃ) yābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ /
SA20srabhusu:812_6: yaduta saṃvegapraharṣābhyāṃ yataścittamevaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣa vimukhaṃ ca /
SA20srabhusu:812_8: abhiṣyandanīyena manaskāreṇa kālena kālamadhyātmaṃ ca pradadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:812_9: yaduta cetaḥśamathena praśrabdhijanakena manaskāreṇa kālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinoti /
SA20srabhusu:813_1: karmā[rā]ntevāsinā vā kālena kālaṃ yadā saṃtāpitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:813_4_0: tamenaṃ dakṣaḥ karmāro vā, karmā[rā]ntevāsī vā tadupamena śilpajñānena karmāntavastunā yatreṣṭā(ma)laṃkāravikṛtistatra pariṇamayatyena
SA20srabhusu:813_4_1: (va)meva yoginā yadā taccittamabhidhyādimalakaṣāye vimukhībhāvenodvejitaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:813_7: śamathapakṣe vā vipaśyanāpakṣe vā tatra tatra sūpaśliṣṭaṃ ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:814_5: ehi, tvaṃ, bhadramukha, trīṇi nimittodgrāhakāni (ṇi) kāraṇāni niśritya yaduta dṛṣṭamvā śrutamvā,
SA20srabhusu:814_8: sa cetsa yogaprayukta ādikarmiko rāgacarito bhavatyaśubhāvineyaḥ kathaṃ sa pañcānāṃ nimittānāmudgrahaṇāyā[va]bodhyate /
SA20srabhusu:814_9: evama[va]bodhyate / ehi, tvaṃ, bhadramukha / yaṃ yameva grāmamvā nigamamvopaniśritya viharasi /
SA20srabhusu:814_10: sa cedanyatra grāme, nigame vānyatamaṃ puruṣamvā, striyamvā ābādhikaṃ śrṛṇoṣi /
SA20srabhusu:814_11: duḥkhitambāḍhaglānaṃ, mṛtamvā kālagataṃ, puruṣamvā striyamvā [/] api tu tasya puruṣasya vā, striyā vānyatamānyatamaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:814_15: no cecchṛṇoṣi / apitu pratyakṣaṃ paśyasi / no vānyasmiṃ (smin) grāmanigame,
SA20srabhusu:815_0: sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā caivaṃ cittaṃ saṃvejaya /
SA20srabhusu:815_1: duḥkho batāyaṃ saṃsāraḥ, kṛcchra ātmabhāvapratilabdho yatremā evaṃ rūpātmamaśca (rūpā ātmanaśca) pareṣāñca vipattaya upalabhyante /
SA20srabhusu:815_2: yadutārogyavipattirapi, jātivipattirapi, bhogavipattirapi, vyādhirvyādhidharmatā ca / maraṇaṃ, maraṇadharmatā ca / api caikeṣāṃ śīlavipattirapi,
SA20srabhusu:815_3: dṛṣṭivipattirapi yato nidānaṃ sattvā dṛṣṭe ca dharme duḥkhavihāriṇo bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:815_12: yatsaṃsāre me saṃsarataḥ, aparinirvṛtasyāvimuktacetasaḥ etā vipattisampattayo,
SA20srabhusu:815_13: na me saṃmukhībhāvaṃ, vimukhībhāvaṃ ca gaccheyuḥ / na vā atonidānaṃ me duḥkhamutpadyate (dyeta) /
SA20srabhusu:815_14: tīvraṃ, kharaṃ, kaṭukamanālāpamalabhyametatsthānaṃ tasmādetatsarvārthamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahāṇaratiratena me bhavitavyamapramattena,
SA20srabhusu:815_15: evaṃ bahulavihāriṇo me apyevāsyānarthasyākriyā syādityevaṃ yoniśaḥ pradadhatsva,
SA20srabhusu:815_18: evaṃ ca punarudgṛhṇīṣva [/] ātmanaḥ śīlāni pratyavekṣasva /
SA20srabhusu:815_23: vyatikrānte vā, me (mayā) śikṣā[ṃ] yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtyādhyāśayena ca punarakaraṇāya cittamutpāditaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:815_26: yaduta / śikṣāpadeṣu / evaṃ na te pratyavekṣamāṇena /
SA20srabhusu:815_28: na punaste cetanā karaṇīyā / kaccinmevipratisāḥ ra utpadyetāpi tu dharmaṃtaiveyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:815_35: sa cet punarbhavasi pūrveṇāparaṃ parīttasyāpi viśeṣādhigame prītirjanayitavyā,
SA20srabhusu:815_36: bhavyohamasmi, pratibalaḥ / evaṃ pariśuddhaśīlo bhagavataḥ śikṣāsu supratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:815_40: / sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati pūrveṇāparaṃ paracittasyāpi viśeṣādhigamasya [/]
SA20srabhusu:815_41: sa tvaṃ tamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pareṣāṃ ca paripūrṇe viśeṣādhigame yaduta tathāgate,
SA20srabhusu:816_1: ehi, tvaṃ, bhadramukha, saṃvejanīyena nimittena saṃtāpitacittaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:816_2: prasadanīyena cittenābhiṣyanditacittaḥ prahāyābhidhyādaurmanasyaṃ (sye) loke bahulaṃ vihariṣyasi /
SA20srabhusu:816_4: / [Śbh_Sh_415] śamathapakṣe, vipaśyanāpakṣe vā, tatra tatrālambane cittaṃ sthitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:816_6_0: evaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣavimukhībhūtaḥ śuklapakṣābhimukhībhūtasya yaduta saṃvegābhiṣyandanatayā sarvaṃ punarasyādīnavanimittamudgṛhṇīṣva
SA20srabhusu:817_17: yaduta pradīpādvā, agniskandhaprabhāsādvā, sūryamaṇḍalādvā, candramaṇḍalādvā nimittamudgṛhya,
SA20srabhusu:817_19: yāvadasthī (sthi)nāmvā, asthiśaṃkalikānāmvā, no cecchmaśānādapi tu citrakṛtādvā,
SA20srabhusu:817_22_0: upasaṃkramyāraṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, śūnyāgāragato vā, maṃce vā, pīṭhe vā, tṛṇasaṃstarake vā niṣīda [ /] paryaṅkamābhujya,
SA20srabhusu:817_22_1: pādau prakṣālya, ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya, pratimukhāṃ (khīṃ) smṛtimupasthāpya,
SA20srabhusu:817_23: niṣadya tatprathamata ekāgratāyāṃ cittāvikṣepe smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kuru,
SA20srabhusu:817_25: tatra ca te vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatu /
SA20srabhusu:817_26: yena vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñāvadhānena tathā tathā nimittavitarkopakleśeṣu vikṣepañca parijānīṣva,
SA20srabhusu:817_28: tatra ca vikṣepāvikṣepe (payoḥ) tathā tathāvahito bhava yathā te ekāgratopanibaddhā,
SA20srabhusu:817_29: adhyātmaṃ cetaḥśamathopanibaddhā sarvā cittasantatiścittadhārā paurvāparyeṇa [Śbh_Sh_417] nirnimittā pravarteta /
SA20srabhusu:817_30: nirvikalpā upaśāntā [/] sa cetpunaḥ saṃpramoṣā[t]smṛtisaṃpramoṣāttathā śamathaprāpte cetasi nimittavitarkopakleśānabhyāsadoṣādābhāsamāgacchanti /
SA20srabhusu:817_32: yaduta pūrvadṛṣṭamevamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā evaṃ tadālambanama[nu]smṛtyamanasikāreṇa vibhāvitaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:817_34: taccaitad, bhadramukha, sūkṣmamālambanaṃ / duḥpra(duṣpra)tividhyamasya te prativi(ve)dhāya tīvra[c]chandaśca vyāyāmaśca karaṇīya[ḥ /
SA20srabhusu:818_4: puruṣa, tailapātrapūrṇaṃ samatittikamanabhiṣekyamantarā ca janakāyaḥ sannipateta /
SA20srabhusu:818_6: pariharttavyamayaṃ ca te utkṣiptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:818_7: sa cettvamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyasi tataste utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣa ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:818_8_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ api nu sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā tailapātramamanasikṛtvā utkṣiptāsikaṃ badhakapuruṣaṃ
SA20srabhusu:818_9: no, bhadanta, tatkasya hetostathā hi tena puruṣeṇo[tkṣi]ptāsiko vadhakapuruṣaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:818_10: tasyaivaṃ syāt [/] sa cedahamasmāttailapātrādekabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ pātayiṣyāmi /
SA20srabhusu:818_11: ato me utkṣiptāsiko badhakapuruṣaḥ ucchinnamūlaṃ śiraḥ prapātayiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:818_12: nānyatra sa puruṣaḥ amanasikṛtya(tvā) janapadakalyāṇī[ṃ] mahāsamājamvā /
SA20srabhusu:818_13: tadeva tailapātraṃ sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya samyageva pariharedevameva bhikṣavaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:818_15: gurukṛtya sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtyate me (ta ime) śrāvakā iti [/]
SA20srabhusu:818_22: satkṛtya viharati / na caikabindumapi pṛthivyāṃ pātayatīti vikṣepāvikṣepaparijñānāvadhānaparigṛhītasya śamathamārgasyaitadadhivacanaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:818_23: yenāyaṃ sarvo (sarvāṃ) cittasantatiṃ cittadhārāṃ nirmimittāṃ nirvikalpāmupaśāntāṃ vīryabalena nirantarāṃ paurvāpayeṇa pravarttayati /
SA20srabhusu:819_1: yāvatte, bhadramukha, evaṃ śamathamārgaprayuktasya evamupāyaparigṛhītaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasahagataṃ sābhirāmaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:819_3: sa cetpunaranabhyāsamoṣānna ramate sopāyaṃ ca tadālamba tasmānnirvikalpādālambanād vyutthāya savikalpa ālambane smṛtyupanibaddhaṃ kurute /
SA20srabhusu:819_4: yadeva te pūrvodgṛhītamaśubhanimittaṃ tadeva manasi kuru tatprathamato nimittamātrānusāriṇyā vipaśyanayā yaduta vinīlakamvā,
SA20srabhusu:819_5: vipūyakamvā, yāvadasthiśaṃkalikāmvā // tathā prayuktaśca tatprathamava(ta) ekaṃ vinīlakamadhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:819_8: tadālambanandvau tadā dvau, trīṇi, catvāri, paṃca, daśa, viṃśa, triṃśaccatvāriṃśat / pañcāśadvinīlakaśataṃvinīlakasahasraṃ,
SA20srabhusu:819_9: yāvatsarvā diśo vidiśaśca / pramāṇākāreṇa pūrvā[ṃ] nirantarā[ma]dhimucyasva /
SA20srabhusu:819_11: yathāvinīlakānāmevaṃ yāvada sthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sarvamevamadhimuktimanaskāraṃ niśritya bhūtamanaskāramavatara,
SA20srabhusu:819_12: evaṃ ca punaravatara, yāvantyetāni vinīlakāni mayādhimuktāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā ato [a]pramāṇavarāṇi me pūrvāntabhārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:819_17: nivartamānānāṃ, tāḥ sa cetkaścit saṃharet saṃhṛtāśca na vinaśyeyuḥ,
SA20srabhusu:819_18: na ca pūtībhaveyuḥ / nāsti sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra teṣāmavakāśaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhusu:819_19: ekakalpikā nāmapi, tāvadyāvadasthiśaṃkalikānāṃ sa cetkaścitsaṃhārako bhavet /
SA20srabhusu:819_24: na caitāni vinīlakāni yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā [yā] vipaśyanāprayuktena sakṛdvipaśyitavyā[ni],
SA20srabhusu:819_25: nānyatraikaṃ vinīlakamadhimucya punaścittaṃ śamayitavyaṃ tāvacca tadvinīkamadhimoktavyaḥ (vyaṃ) yāvattasmenā (sminnā)lambane sābhirāmaprabhāsvaraṃ nopāyāsena paryavanahyate /
SA20srabhusu:819_27: tasmin samaye adhyātmaṃ sā(saṃ?) śamayitavyaṃ yathā vinīlakamevaṃ yāvadasthiśaṃkalikaikā evaṃ yāvadapramāṇā anenaiva nayena veditavyā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:819_28_0: cittamadhyātmaṃ saṃśamayitvā (saṃśamya) vimoktavyāstataḥ sarvapaścādapramāṇāni vinīlakānyapramāṇā yāvadasthiśaṃkalikā adhyātmaṃ
SA20srabhusu:820_4: evaṃ ca te śamathavipaśyanāmārge ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:820_5: sa ce dādita eva avispaṣṭodhivimokṣo bhaviṣyatyālambane samya[gā]bhāsaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:820_6: sa tena hetunā, tena pratyayena, bhāvanābhāsādviśiṣṭatā bhaviṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:820_7: pracurābhāsa(ga)tā ca / sa cetpunarādita eva vispaṣṭo bhaviṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:820_8: pracurābhāsaḥ / sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vispaṣṭataratāṃ pracurābhāsataratāñca gamiṣyati /
SA20srabhusu:820_10: prasadanīyanimittena, śamathanimittena, vipaśyanānimittena, lokanimittena, sūdgṛhītena kālamadhyātmaṃ cittaṃ saṃśayamayankālena kālaṃ dharmānvicinvanti(cinvan),
SA20srabhusu:820_13_0: evaṃ ca punarvicinvan bahirdhā ṣaṭtriṃśato (t)dravyāṇi kāyāt keśādi prasāvaparyantā (ntaṃ) nimittamudgṛhya adhyātmametāni
SA20srabhusu:820_14: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmaṃ kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ yadutātmano 'ntaḥ kāyamārabhya,
SA20srabhusu:820_15: sa tvaṃ punarapi bahirdhā aśubhānimittenodgṛhītena vinīlakaṃ cādhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:820_18: idaṃ te bhaviṣyati / bahirdhā kāyena kāyānupaśyanāyā,
SA20srabhusu:820_20: sa tvaṃ punarapyātmanaḥ antaḥkāye 'śubhatāparibhāvitena cetasāścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasā parakāye cāntarbahiścāśubhatāparibhāvitena cetasātmānaṃ ghri(mri)yamāṇamadhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:820_22: śmaśāne cchoritaṃ / choritamvā vinīlakāvasthaṃ, vipūyakāvasthaṃ, yāvadasthiśaṃkālikāvasthamadhimucyasva,
SA20srabhusu:820_23: idaṃ te bhaviṣyatyadhyātmabahirdhā kāye kāyānupaśyanāyāḥ sa[t]tvaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:820_24: punarapi catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ śrutacintādhipateyena parikalpanimittagrāheṇa triṣu bhāgeṣvadhimucyasva śamathapakṣye,
SA20srabhusu:820_25_0: vikṣepapakṣye, vipaśyanāpakṣye ca / yadādhyātmaṃ cittamabhisaṃkṣipasi tatra nirmimittanirvikalpopaśamākārā nirvyāpārānutsukāsaṃkṣobhaniḥparidāha
SA20srabhusu:820_28: citte, dharmeṣu, dharmānupaśyanāyāḥ sattvaṃ / ye pūrvaṃ viṣayopādānā, viṣayālambanā asamāhitabhūmipatitā abhyapatitāḥ [Śbh_Sh_424] kṣīṇā,
SA20srabhusu:820_29_0: ye caitarhi smṛtisaṃpramoṣāccittakṣepe satyutpadyante nimittavitarkopakleśālambanādhipateyā vedanādayaścatvāro [a]rūpiṇaḥ
SA20srabhusu:820_31: idaṃ te bhaviṣyati / bahirdhā vedanācittadharmānupaśyanāyāḥ sattvaṃ,

SA20srabhusu:855_4_0: smāraṇīyaṃ sarvataḥ kāyādyuta(dyaduta) vivekajena prītisukhena sa tasmiṃ(smin) samaye viviktaiḥ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ
SA20srabhusu:855_4_1: savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ paṃcā[ṅ]gamupasampadya viharati /
SA20srabhusu:856_2: prahātavyasya ca prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca prāptaye cittaṃ praṇidhatte /
SA20srabhusu:856_3: ādhimokṣikeṇa ca manaskāreṇa prahāṇāya prāptaye ca samyak prayogamārabhate /
SA20srabhusu:856_8: prayoganiṣṭhāphalenaiṣāṃ kleśaprakārāṇāṃ bhāvitānāṃ subhāvitānāṃ bhāvanāphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20srabhusu:857_2: yaśca prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ, yaśca prayoganiṣṭho 'yaṃ prātipakṣiko manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:858_1: ityucyate / evaṃ sati ṣaṭṣu manaskāreṣu catvāro manaskārāḥ pravighnā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:859_4: avitarkaśca dvitīyadhyāne śāntalakṣaṇaṃ sa lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ /
SA20srabhusu:859_6: yaḥ samāhitabhūmiko 'pyugrālambanabhārī tatprathamopanipātitayā cālambane audāriko manojalpaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:860_0: bāhyāyatanasaṃgṛhītāśca / sarva eva cātītā, anāgatapratyutpannā, hetusamutpannāḥ, pratītyasamutpannāḥ, ākāyikāstāvatkalikāḥ / itvarapratyupasthāyinaścittasaṃkṣobhakarā,
SA20srabhusu:860_2: uparimāṃ bhūmimārabhya duḥkhavihārānugatatvātkuṣṇapakṣyā kāmavivekaprītisukhamevānuśaṃsānugatā bhūmiścaiṣā tādṛśī prakṛtyā yatra sthitasya nityaṃ nityakālaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:860_3: dhruvaṃ dhruvakālaṃ, savitarkaḥ, savicāraḥ, cittapracāraḥ pravartate / na śāntapraśānta ityevamādibhirākārairvitarkeṣvaudārikalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:861_1: sarvaśo nāstyetadaudārikalakṣaṇamavitarkedvitīye dhyāne ityataḥ śāntaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamasyaudārikatvasyāpagamāt /
SA20srabhusu:861_2: śeṣo(ṣe) manaskārā dvitīyadhyānasamāpattaye yathā(pi) yogaṃ pūrvavadveditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:861_3: evaṃ bhūmau bhūmau yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattaye yathāyogaṃ sapta manaskārā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:862_0: audārikalakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvāsvadharimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvadākiṃcanyāyatanāt samāsena dvividhaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:862_4: yasyā yasyā bhūmervairāgyaṃ karttukāmo bhavatyupariṣṭācca yathāyogaṃ śāntalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:863_7: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ kāmavivekaṃ (kaḥ) tasyānantaramutpannaṃ(nnaḥ) /
SA20srabhusu:863_9: prītau vā doṣadarśanāt / sarvadauṣṭhulyāpagamācca vipulapraśrabdhi cittakāyakarmaṇyatayā prītisukhamanupūrveṇa gaṇayataḥ /
SA20srabhusu:863_12: [Śbh_Sh_451] nikāmalābhī, akṛcchralābhī, akisara(akṛtsna?)lābhī, tathā dhyānasamāpattyā rātrimatināmayati /
SA20srabhusu:863_15: vyagracāriṇa ālambanādvivecya avyagracāriṇyālambane ekadharmatayā śāntaṃ prasannaṃ cittaṃ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:863_18_0: tenāha cetasa ekotībhāvāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vitarkavicāraprahāṇādavitarkamavicāraṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ samādhistasyānantaraṃ
SA20srabhusu:863_19: tenāha samādhijaṃ īpsitāninditārthaprāpteḥ prītau vā doṣadarśanāt /
SA20srabhusu:863_21: prītisukhamanupūrveṇa gaṇayato dvitīyaṃ bhavatyevaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:864_1: tenāha prītervirāgāt [/] [Śbh_Sh_452] tasmiṃśca samaye dvividho 'sya cittakṣobhakaraḥ apakṣālo 'dhigato bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:864_4: etarhi ca prītiḥ, tenāha upekṣako viharati / etau hi dvau dharmau cittasaṃkṣobhakarau /
SA20srabhusu:864_13: yathā yathā te prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:864_14: sa cetpunarabhāvitatvāt tṛtīyasya dhyānasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkadācitkarhicit citte prītisahagatāḥ saṃjñāmanasikārāḥ samudācaranti /
SA20srabhusu:864_17: prajahāti vinodayati / vyantīkaroti, cittamadhyupekṣate / tenāha smṛtaḥ saṃprajānā[na] iti /
SA20srabhusu:864_18: tasya tasminsamaye evamupekṣakasya viharatā smṛtasya saṃprajanya syāsevanānvayādbahulīkārānvayātprītisahagataṃ prahīyate /
SA20srabhusu:864_19: taccittauddhatyakaraṃ, niḥprītikaṃ, śāntaṃ, praśāntaṃ cetasi veditamutpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:864_21: manaḥkāyena vedita sukhaṃ ca praśrabdhisukhaṃ pratisamvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:864_22: tṛtīyācca dhyānāt / adhastadrūpaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti nāpi nirantarā upekṣā tṛtīyā[d]dhyānādūrdhvaṃ yadapyupekṣopalabhyate /
SA20srabhusu:864_23: na tu sukhaṃ / tatrādhaḥ sukhopekṣābhāvādūrdhvaṃ ca sukhābhāvāt /
SA20srabhusu:864_24: idaṃ tadāyatanaṃ yaduta tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yattadāryā ācakṣate /
SA20srabhusu:864_25: yatpratilambhavihāriṇaṃ pudgalamadhikṛtya smṛtimāṃ(mān) sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharatīti āryāḥ punaḥ vṛddhāśca vṛddhaśrāvakāśca /
SA20srabhusu:865_3: tasya ca niṣevaṇābhyāsāttṛtīyadhyānāccalito yatra [Śbh_Sh_454] tṛtīyadhyānabhūmisukhaṃ tatprajahāti /
SA20srabhusu:865_4: tenāha / sukhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorasta(ṅ)gamāt /
SA20srabhusu:865_5: tatra caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle tasmin samaye sa dhyāyī sukhaduḥkhavyatikramamanuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhusu:865_8: sukhasya ca prahāṇāt(d), duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt, pūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorasta[ṅ]gamāt /
SA20srabhusu:865_9: tanna caturthadhyānasamāpattikāle sukhasya ca prahāṇāaddvitīyadhyānasamāpattikāle duḥkhasya,
SA20srabhusu:865_13: na viśiṣṭā bhavati / tenāha / aduḥkhāsukhā tasmin samaye prathamaṃ dhyānamupādāya sarve adhobhūmikāḥ apakṣālāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhusu:865_14: tadyathā vitarkavicārāḥ, prītirāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ / teṣāṃ ca prahāṇādyā tatropekṣā /
SA20srabhusu:865_17: sarveñjitāyatanaṃ / [Śbh_Sh_455] tenāha / upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhamiti [/] tatra caturthamiti pūrvavad veditavyam /
SA20srabhusu:865_18: tatrākāśādhimokṣasya varṇasaṃjñā nīlapītalohitāvadātādipratisaṃyuktatāmasātāmasātayā nirvirāgatayā ca samatikrānto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:865_19: tenāha / rūpasaṃjñānāṃ [Śbh_Sh_456] samatikramādanābhāsagamanahetoryā anekavidhā bahunānāprakārā varṇapracayahetukā āvaraṇasaṃjñā sā (yā) sā vigatā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:865_21: tāsāmvā punarvigamahetoryā aupacayikīsaṃjñāsteṣvavaśiṣṭeṣu viśiṣṭeṣu saṃghāteṣu pravṛttāstadyathā bhojanapānavastrālaṃkāragṛhodyānavanasenāparvatādisaṃjñā[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:865_24: sa evaṃ rūpapratighanānātvasaṃjñā bhāvayitvā anantākāreṇākāśādhimukto bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:865_28: tasyākāśamālambanaṃ samāpannasya punastacca tadanye ca skandhāḥ svabhūmikāḥ sāmantake punaradhobhūmikā api skandhāḥ /
SA20srabhusu:867_0: sa vijñānānantyāyatanāduccalito vijñānāt pareṇālambanaṃ samanveṣamāṇo na punarlabhate (/
SA20srabhusu:867_2: arūpi vā [/] sa tadālambanamalabhamānaḥ sasāmāntakamaulaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ [sa]matikramya nāsti kiñcidanyadā lambanamadhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:867_4: sa tasya saṃjñādhimokṣasya bahulīkārānvayādākiṃcanyāyatanasāmantakaṃ samatikramya yāvatprayoganiṣṭhā(n) manasikārānmaulaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphale samāpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:867_5: tenāha / sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiñcidityākiñcanyāyatanamupasaṃspṛśya (-sampadya) viharatīti /
SA20srabhusu:868_6: akiñcanasaṃjñāyā vā, akiñcanasaṃjñā vā, na ca punaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sāsya saṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:868_7: tadyathā āsaṃjñi[ke]vā, nirodhasamāpattau vā, nānyatra sūkṣmā sā saṃjñā nimittālambane pravartate /
SA20srabhusu:868_8_0: naiva saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā [ /] evaṃ tadāyatanādhimuktaḥ sasāmantakamaulamākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasya
SA20srabhusu:868_9: tenāha / sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatana[ṃ] samatikramya naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanamupasampadya viharatīti /
SA20srabhusu:869_4: [Śbh_Sh_459] tatrāsaṃjñāsamāpatti[ṃ] saṃjñāvimukhena manaskāreṇa pṛthagjana eva samāpadyate,
SA20srabhusu:870_0: tatra dvābhyāṃ manaskārābhyāmanayoḥ samāpattyoḥ samāpattipraveśo bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:870_7: samanaskārasamāpannasya ca punaścittaṃ na pravartata iti /
SA20srabhusu:870_8: sa evaṃ niḥsaraṇasaṃjñā pūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa śubhakṛtyavītarāgasya,
SA20srabhusu:870_9: bṛhatphalebhyo vītarāgasya, cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate [a]saṃjña (jñi)samāpattiḥ /
SA20srabhusu:871_0: tatra naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalābhī āryaḥ pareṇa śāntena vihāreṇa viharttukāmaḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanāccittamuccā layati /
SA20srabhusu:871_2_0: alabhamānaṃ nirudhyate / na pravarttata iti / ya evamākiñcanyāyatanavītarāgasya śaikṣasyārhato vā vihārasaṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manaskāreṇa
SA20srabhusu:871_2_1: cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodha iyamucyate nirodhasamāpattirevaṃ ca punarasyāḥ prāptirbhavati /
SA20srabhusu:872_1: kathaṃ ca punarbhavati / yathāpi taddhyāyī lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:872_2: pariśuddhasya dhyānasya [/] sa tatpariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya yo [a]nenābhijñādhipataye(pateyo) dharma[ḥ] śruto bhavatyudgṛhītaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:872_4: pūrvenivāsadivyaśrotracyutyupapādacetaḥ paryāyamvā tameva manasi kurvan samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇārthapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:872_5: dharmapratisaṃvedī ca / tasyārthapratisaṃvedino dharma(ḥ) pratisaṃvedinastathāstathā (stathā tathā) cittānyabhisaṃskurvato bahulīkārānvayād bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:872_6: sa kālo bhavati samayo yadasya bhāja(va)nāphalāḥ (ḥ) paṃcābhijñā utpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:874_1: tadyathā tūlapindhurvā, karpāsapindhurvā [/] vāyumaṇḍalake vā sa tathā [a]dhimucyamānaḥ tatra prerayatyādhimokṣikeṇaiva manaskāreṇa [/]
SA20srabhusu:874_4: tatra mṛdusaṃjñā / mṛdukaṃ kāyamadhimucyate / tadyathā kauśayamvā, kaccamvā, padgamvā, [/] itīyaṃ mṛdusaṃjñāyā laghusaṃjñāyā[ḥ] poṣikā,
SA20srabhusu:874_6: tatrākāśadhātusaṃjñā yayā saṃjñayā laghutāṃ ca mṛdutāṃ cātmano 'dhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:874_8: tatra yadantarālaṃ vivandhacaraṃ rūpigataṃ gamanāya tadākāśamadhimucyate [/]
SA20srabhusu:874_10: tatra cittakāyasamavadhānasaṃjñā yayā cittamvā kāye samavadadhāti /
SA20srabhusu:874_11: kāyamvā citte, yenāsya kāyo laghutaraśca bhavati,
SA20srabhusu:874_12: mṛdutaraśca, karmaṇyataraśca, prabhāsvarataraśca [/] cittānvayaścitta pratibandhaścittaṃ niśritya varttate /
SA20srabhusu:874_14: āsannaṃ dūre, aṇu sthūlaṃ, sthūlamaṇu, pṛthivī āpaḥ, āpaḥ pṛthivī evamekaikena mahābhūtenānyonyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ /
SA20srabhusu:875_0: ityābhiḥ pañcasaṃjñābhiḥ bhāvanāyā pariniṣpannābhiranekavidhamṛddhiṣayaṃ pratyanubhavatyeko bhūtvā bahudhātmānamupadarśayati /
SA20srabhusu:875_1: yadutādhimokṣikayā nairmāṇikayā(kyā)saṃjñayā tatra bahudhā punarātmānamupadarśayancai(yaṃścai)kī bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:875_7: tadyathā pakṣī śakuni[ḥ], imau vā sūryācandramasāvevaṃ mahardhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi /
SA20srabhusu:875_10: yathāyogamveditavyaṃ / tatra dvividhābrahmalokasya kāyena vaśe vartanā,
SA20srabhusu:875_11: gamanena ca (/) vaśe varttayati / yathaivādhimuktyā vā, brahmalokādadhaścartukāmatā bhūtānāṃ tadekatyasya copādāyarūpasya [/
SA20srabhusu:876_0: tatra pūrvānubhūtacaritānukramānusmṛtisaṃjñā yayā kumārakabhāvamupādāya yatrāsya smṛtiḥ pravarttate /
SA20srabhusu:876_1_0: na vyāhanyate / yatrārya gato bhavati, sthito, niṣaṇṇuḥ(ṇṇaḥ), [Śbh_Sh_465] śayito vistareṇa sarvāṃ pūrvānubhūtāṃ caryāmaudāraudārikaudārikatayā
SA20srabhusu:876_2: kayā samanusmaransaṃjānāti / tasyā bhāvanānvayād bhāvanāphalamanekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsaṃ samanusmarati yāvatsansā(saṃsā)raṃ soddeśaṃ vistareṇa [/]
SA20srabhusu:876_4: yasmin grāme vā, nigame vā śreṇyāmvā, pūge vā, parṣadi vā, āyataviśāle vā gṛhe, avavarake vā, nānāprakārasya janakāyasya sanniṣaṇṇasya sannipatitasya yo vyatimiśro,
SA20srabhusu:876_5: vicitro, nirghoṣo niścarita / yaḥ kalakalaśabda ityucyate /
SA20srabhusu:876_7: tatra nimittamudgṛhya yā saṃjñābhāvanā yayā samāhitabhūmikena manasikāreṇāryānāryeṣu śabdeṣu,
SA20srabhusu:876_9: tasyāsya bahulīkārānvayād bhāvanāphalaṃ divyaṃ śrotraṃ pratilabhate /
SA20srabhusu:876_15: yena divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena vistareṇa yāvatkāyasya bhedātsvargatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante(te) /
SA20srabhusu:876_19: rūpavikṛtiḥ / tadyathā uddhatendriyatā, smitamukhatā [/] evaṃ rūpā dviṣṭasya rūpāvasthā bhavati /
SA20srabhusu:876_22: rūpavikṛtiḥ / tadyathā mūkatā arthanidhyaptāvapratipadyanatā (danatā) prākṛtāprākṛtā vā vāgvyāhāratā [/]
SA20srabhusu:876_26: yena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ vitarkitaṃ vicāritaṃ mano manasā yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20srabhusu:878_4: tattathaiva bhavati / nānyathā / sarveṇa tena kāryaṃ śakyate kartum /
SA20srabhusu:878_5: anāryayā na punarna tathaiva bhavatyapi tu /
SA20srabhusu:878_7: evamābhirdvādaśabhiḥ saṃjñābhirbahulīkārānvayādyathāyogaṃ sa pañcānāmabhijñānāmāryāṇāṃ ca guṇānāmapṛthagjanasandhāraṇānāṃ yathāyogamabhinirhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:879_0: tatra prathame dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātraparibhāvitena yathāyogaṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ,
SA20srabhusu:879_2: dvitīye dhyāne mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhāvite yathāyogaṃ parīttānāmābhāsvarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupasaṃpadyate /
SA20srabhusu:879_7: sa cetpunaranāgāmī anāsraveṇa dhyānena caturthena sāsravaṃ,
SA20srabhusu:879_9: tasmiṃ(smin) mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarādhimātratamabhāvite yathāyogaṃ pañcānāṃ śuddhāvāsānāṃ devānāṃ sa(ha)bhāgatāyāmupasampadyate /
SA20srabhusu:880_5: mandabhāṇī ca bhavati, praśāntabhāṇī ca [/] na saṃgaṇikārāmo, na saṃsargārāmo, dhīrā cāsya vāg(k)pravartate /
SA20srabhusu:880_10: / anabhidhyāluravikṣobhyaḥ / kṣamāvānna cāsya kāmavitarkādayaḥ pāpakāścittaṃ kṣobhayanti /
SA20srabhusu:880_11: ityevaṃ bhāgīyāni vītarāgaliṃgāni veditavyānītyayaṃ tāvat laukikamārgagamanasya vibhāgaḥ /
SA20srabhusu:881_0: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa gantukāmo bhavati tasya catvāryāryasatyānyārabhya sapta manaskārā anupūrveṇotpadyante /
SA20srabhusu:881_3: subhāvitamanaskāro vā, mauladhyānārūpyalābhī vā, caturbhirākārairduḥkhasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:881_4: tadyathānityākāreṇa, duḥkhākāreṇa, anātmākāreṇa ca / caturbhirākāraiḥ samudayasatyasya tadyathā hetutaḥ,
SA20srabhusu:881_5: samudayataḥ, prabhavataḥ, pratyayataśca [/] caturbhirākārairnirodhasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisamvedayate /

SA20srabhusu:929_1: asya duḥkhasya ko hetuḥ, kaḥ samudayaḥ, prabhavaḥ, pratyayaḥ iti / yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /

SA20srabhusu:929_11: sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ,

SA20srabhusu:930_2: tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ] /
SA20srabhusu:930_4: tenāha hetu[taḥ], samudayataḥ, prabhavataḥ, pratyayataśca / evamayaṃ yogī ebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisamvedayate /
SA20srabhusu:931_0: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati /
SA20srabhusu:931_3: nityatvānnissaraṇataḥ / evamayaṃ caturbhirākāraiḥ nirodhasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati /
SA20srabhusu:931_7: nyāyataḥ, pratipattito, nairyāṇikataśca ākārayati / sa evaṃ caturbhirākārairmārgatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisamvedayate /

SA20srabhusu:932_6: tasya ca nirodhaḥ / śāntaḥ, mārgo, nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ /

SA20srabhusu:933_1: yadutopapattisādhanayuktyā, yaduta yāvadbhāvikatāṃ vā, tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate /
SA20srabhusu:933_4: sa tasyānvayā[d]dve satye adhikṛtya duḥkhasatyañca [Śbh_Sh_496] samudayasatyañca aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhate /
